87b7('dul ba): tu byung ba de ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis bas mtha'i gnas mal la dad pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tu lung bstan to/ /de na 'dis smon lam btab pa/ 'di ltar bdag gis bcom
88a1('dul ba): l dan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon gnas bla na med pa 'od srung gi thad du tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga'
88a2('dul ba): yang thob par ma gyur gyi/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bdag bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis/ bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye rgu'i tshe lo
88a3('dul ba): brgya thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan pa gang yin pa de'i gsung rab la bdag rab
88a4('dul ba): tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur zhing / ji ltar bdag gi mkhan po/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
88a5('dul ba): rgyas 'od srung gis bas mtha'i gnas mal la dad pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du bdag kyang shAkya'i rgyal po chen po shAkya thub pa des/ bas mtha'i gnas mal la dad
88a6('dul ba): pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tu ston par gyur cig / ces btab pa'i smon lam gyi dbang gis da ltar de bzhin gshegs pas/ bas mtha'i gnas mal la dad pa rnams kyi nang na mchog
88a7('dul ba): tu bstan to/ /dge slong dag /de ltar na/ las gcig tu nag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni/ gcig tu nag la/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni/ gcig tu dkar/ 'dren ma rnams
88b1('dul ba): kyi ni/ 'dren ma yin no/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ las gcig tu nag pa dang / 'dren ma rnams spangs nas/ las gcig tu dkar ba dag la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag gis
88b2('dul ba): de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /drug sde rnams 'di byin cig/
88b3('dul ba): 'di las byin cig ces 'dam zhing 'dam zhing zas za ba dang 'brim pa 'khrug par gyur nas skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
88b4('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis bdams shing zas bza' bar mi bya ste/ za na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal
88b5('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong rnams zas za ba na lhung bzed bzed pa las/ de lhung bzed kyi gzhi'i steng du lhung bzed kyi gzhi bzed pa las lhung
88b6('dul ba): bzed du lhung nas de rnams 'gyod de mi za ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /lhung bzed
88b7('dul ba): bzed pa las lhung bzed kyi gzhi'i steng du lhung na/ byin len byas pa zhes bya/ lhung bzed kyi gzhi bzed pa las lhung bzed kyi nang du lhung na/ byin len byas pa zhes bya/ lhung bzed
89a1('dul ba): bzed pa las lhung bzed kyi nang du lhung na byin len byas pa zhes bya/ lhung bzed kyi gzhi bzed pa las lhung bzed kyi gzhi'i nang du lhung na/ byin len byas pa zhes bya ste/
89a2('dul ba): 'on kyang byin len gyi sems ni/ nye bar gzhag par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /
89a3('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bo 'khar ba'i mgar pa'i drung du song nas des smras pa/ bzhin bzang / 'khar ba'i lhung bzed cig bya na/ nus sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ 'di nyid
89a4('dul ba): bdag gi bzo lags kyi/ tshad ji tsam zhig bgyi/ chen por bya'o/ /'phags pa/ khyod la 'khar ba'i lhung bzed chen po ci 'tshal/ bkren pa/ khyod ci rin med par byed du 'jug snyam
89a5('dul ba): mam| rin thang bzhin sbyin gyi/ byos shig /des bsam pa/ 'di la bdag gi 'khar ba ci zhig 'god/ bya'o/ /snyam nas des de'i 'khar ba'i lhung bzed chen po zhig byas so/ /des
89a6('dul ba): smras pa/ gang 'di'i nang du chud pa gzhan zhig kyang gyis shig /des gzhan yang byas so/ /de bzhin du gzhan gang yin pa bdun pa'i bar du byas nas de rnams tshe dang ldan pa nye dga'
89a7('dul ba): b os| dge tshul 'khrur bcug ste tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pa las dra ba byed du bcug nas de rnams der bcug ste go rim bshams nas dge tshul gyi mgo la bkur te gang du mgron du bos
89b1('dul ba): pa der 'gro'o/ /son nas de dag bkram ste 'dug pa dang / khyim bdag dang / bram ze rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ ci khyod kyis 'khar ba'i mgar ba'i zong bkram mam/ des smras pa/
89b2('dul ba): bkren pa/ khyed ci shes/ 'dir ni/ re zhig phye dag blang ngo / /'dir ni/ snum khur dag go/ 'dir ni/ 'bras can dag go /gzhan rnams su ni/ tshod ma dag blang ngo / /de rnams kyis smras pa/
89b3('dul ba): 'phags pa/ gal te de ltar na/ ko/ res 'ga' tshod ma mang po dag 'byung bas/ gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang nye bar gzhag dgos so/ /zhes byas pa dang / de cang mi smra bar 'dug go /skabs
89b4('dul ba): de| dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong rnams 'khar ba'i lhung bzed 'chang ba
89b5('dul ba): las gyur gyi/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis 'khar ba'i lhung bzed bcang bar mi bya'o/ /'chang na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /kha gzar dang / tsha khug dang / phul ba'i btung
89b6('dul ba): phor ni/ ma gtogs so/ /sdom ni/ rkang pa bkru ba bkab pa dang / /chol zangs dag ni gnang ba dang / /de bzhin bsil yab nyid dang ni/ sbrang ma rnams la g.yab pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom
89b7('dul ba): ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong rnams bab bab tu rkang pa 'khru ba der sbrang bu dag gis gang bar
90a1('dul ba): 'dug go / ji tsam na bram ze dang / khyim bdag gtsug lag khang bltar 'ongs pa de dag gis mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa/ sbrang bu zi zi mchi bas gang dang
90a2('dul ba): phyogs 'di ci zhig/ dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag gis 'dir rkang pa bkrus so/ /de dag 'phya ste shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams ni/ gtsang sbra med de/ bab bab tu rkang pa
90a3('dul ba): 'khru'o/ /zhes pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rkang pa bab bab tu bkru bar mi bya'i/ 'on kyang
90a4('dul ba): gnas khang gi steng shar lho'i mtshams su rkang pa bkru ba'i gnas bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rkang pa bkru ba'i gnas bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis
90a5('dul ba): ji lta bu bya ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rus sbal lta bur bya'o/ /rab tu 'jam par byed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rtsub por
90a6('dul ba): bya'o/ /dge slong rgas pa/ 'khogs pa/ nyam chung ba de dag phyogs der 'gro mi nus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag gis gyo mo nye bar gzhag par
90a7('dul ba): bya'o| |dge slong rnams gyo mor 'khru ba na/ de chag nas je ma rung bar gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chol zangs nye bar gzhag par bya'o/ /bcom ldan
90b1('dul ba): 'das kyis chol zangs nye bar gzhag par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel las byas pa'i chol zangs dag nye bar gzhag
90b2('dul ba): go| bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa/ 'di ci zhig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ bzhin bzang dag /bcom ldan 'das kyis chol zangs gnang ngo / /
90b3('dul ba): 'phags pa/ ci/ dge sbyong khyod 'dod pa'i yon tan dag gis gnod dam/ de dag gis smras pa/ khyed kyi mgrin par rdog pas mnan te gnod do/ /de dag 'phya ba'i skabs de/ dge slong
90b4('dul ba): rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gser dang / dngul dang / shel dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa'i chol zangs dag nye bar gzhag
90b5('dul ba): par mi bya ste/ 'on kyang 'jim las byas pa'i chol zangs nye bar gzhag par bya'o/ /rnga mo lta bu nye bar bzhag pa dang / de ldeg nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ glang po che'i
90b6('dul ba): rkang pa lta bur bya zhing / de'i dbus su 'bur ka dam pa'i me tog lta bur bya'o/ /shin tu 'jam por byas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rtsub por bya'o/ /dge slong
90b7('dul ba): rnams chol zangs bab bab tu 'jog nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi khang thog tu khas phul la zhog cig /gang zag gi ni/ gnas khang gi sgo lkog tu zhog
91a1('dul ba): cig / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul ko'u sham+b+hi na sgra len gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dpyid kyi yul la bab nas dge slong rnams tsha bas rmya ste de dag
91a2('dul ba): lus skya bo seng seng por gyur cing / rke/ nyam chung / shig shig po/ rod nyams par gyur pa khyim bdag dang / bram ze rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa/ khyed ci'i slad
91a3('dul ba): du lus skya bo seng seng por gyur cing / rke/ nyam chung / shig shig po/ rod nyams par gyur/ de dag gis ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag/
91a4('dul ba): khyed bsil yab mi 'chang ngam/ bzhin bzang dag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /'phags pa dag /khyed kyi ston pa ni/ thugs rje can yin pas/ gnang bar 'gyur ro/ /
91a5('dul ba): skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ gnang gi/ bsil yab bcang bar bya'o/ /bcom
91a6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bsil yab bcang bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis yu ba gser dang / dngul dang / shel dang / baiDUR+Ya las byas pa/ bsrubs pa/ bkra ba
91a7('dul ba): dang / nye bar bkra ba'i yu ba can gyi bsil yab dag bcangs pa dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis zhes bya ba nas khyed kyi mgrin pa rdog pas mnan te gnod do/ /zhes bya ba'i
91b1('dul ba): bar snga ma bzhin no/ /de dag 'phya ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yu ba gser dang / dngul dang / bai
91b2('dul ba): DUR+Ya dang / shel las byas pa/ bsrubs pa/ bkra ba dang / nye bar bkra ba'i yu ba can gyi bsil yab dag nye bar gzhag par mi bya'i/ 'on kyang bsil yab gnyis po rtswa bal ba dza las
91b3('dul ba): byas pa dang / shing ta la'i 'dab ma bcang bar bya'o/ /bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can dag dge slong rnams la bsil yab rnam pa sna tshogs 'bul ba na zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin
91b4('dul ba): no| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ gnang gi/ dge 'dun gyi phyir bcang bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram khang pa
91b5('dul ba): brtsegs pa na bzhugs so/ /dge slong rnams la sbrang ma dag za ste/ de dag gi lus sbrang mas zos pas/ 'brum bus gang ste/ de dag gis yang dang yang du phrugs pa dang / bram ze dang /
91b6('dul ba): khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag/ khyed ci'i phyir lus 'di ltar 'brum bus gang / de dag gis ji ltar gyur ba bsnyad pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag/
91b7('dul ba): khyed sbrang yab mi 'chang ngam/ bzhin bzang dag /bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /'phags pa dag /khyed kyi ston pa ni/ thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro/ /skabs de/ dge
92a1('dul ba): slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ gnang gi/ sbrang yab bcang bar bya'o/ /bcom
92a2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis sbrang yab bcang bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis yu ba gser dang / dngul dang / baiDUR+Ya dang / shel las byas pa dang / rnga ma las byas pa'i
92a3('dul ba): bsil yab dag nye bar bzhag pa dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /sbrang yab ni/ lnga ste/ bal las byas pa dang / sha na las byas pa dang /
92a4('dul ba): ras bal las byas pa dang / ras ma dang / lo ma sbams pa'o/ /sdom ni/ gos mdud pa dang lus dang ni/ /'khar ba dra ba 'chang ba dang / /sgog skya dag ni bkag pa dang / /nad pa la ni
92a5('dul ba): gnang ba'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis stongs mo bya'o//
92a6('dul ba): zhes bka' stsal pa dang / de na dge slong cig skas la 'jog pa na/ 'og na shing mkhan zhig 'dug pa des/ de mdoms thang ba mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa/ khyod skyes pa'i dbang po
92a7('dul ba): dang ldan pas bdag gis pho lags par gdod 'tshal lo/ /de gnong nas cang mi smra bar 'dug pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
92b1('dul ba): 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong rnams gos mdud pa ma bor ba nyid du skas la 'dzeg pa las gyur gyi/ de'i phyir dge slong mkhar len byed pa gos
92b2('dul ba): mdud pa bor nas mkhar lan byed du gzhug go / snyam du dgongs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ dge slong stongs mo byed pas gos mdud pa bor nas
92b3('dul ba): mkhar lan bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis gos mdud pa bor nas mkhar lan bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams gos mdud pa bor nas mkhar len byed
92b4('dul ba): pa na/ ma dad pa rnams 'phya ste/ 'phags pa/ ci stobs 'gyed dam/ de dag gis smras pa/ bzhin bzang dag /mkhar len byed do/ /de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug pa'i skabs de/ dge
92b5('dul ba): slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang dag skabs la 'dzeg pa de dag gis mdud pa por bar bya'i/ gzhan dag gis ni/ ma
92b6('dul ba): yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /drug sde rnams lus kyis khur khyer ba dang /
92b7('dul ba): bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams 'phya ste/ 'phags pa/ bdag cag ni/ re zhig pha ma dang / bu dang / chung ma'i slad du khur thogs na/ khyed su'i slad du lus kyis khur bsnams/ de
93a1('dul ba): dag gis smras pa/ bzhin bzang dag /bdag cag la yang ston pa mchod pa dang / dge 'dun bshos gsol ba dang / nad pa rnams kyi rim gro dang bya ba mang po yod
93a2('dul ba): do| |de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go / skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis lus
93a3('dul ba): kyis khur bkur bar mi bya'o/ /khyer na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs so/ /dge slong rnams bya
93a4('dul ba): rgod kyi phung po'i ri la 'dzeg cing 'bab pa na/ de dag 'bred cing rdeg 'chos te snad par gyur to/ /skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
93a5('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ dge slong rnams kyis 'khar ba bcang bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis 'khar ba bcang bar bya'o/ /zhes bka'
93a6('dul ba): stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel las byas pa'i 'khar ba/ bsrubs pa/ bkra ba/ nye bar bkra ba dag bcangs pa bram ze dang / khyim
93a7('dul ba): bdag rnams kyis mthong nas 'phya ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de lta bas
93b1('dul ba): na| gnyis kyis 'khar ba bcang bar bya ste/ rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba dang / nad pa sbyor mi nus pas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gnyis kyis 'khar ba bcang bar bya ste/ rgan po rgas te nyam
93b2('dul ba): chung ba dang / nad pa sbyor mi bzod pas so/ /zhes bka' stsal pa/ rgan por gtogs pa dang / nad par gtogs pa rnams kyang 'khar ba 'chang ba zhugs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
93b3('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ rgan po dang / nad pas dge 'dun la 'khar ba'i sdom pa gsol bar bya zhing / gang la dge 'dun gyis 'khar ba'i sdom pa byin pa des 'khar ba bcang bar bya'o/ gsol ba ni/
93b4('dul ba): 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams la gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dus shing 'khod pa dang / dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung
93b5('dul ba): ba'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzod pas rgan pa'i mthar tsog tsog por 'dug la thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smra bar bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag dge slong rgan po
93b6('dul ba): rgas te nyam chung ba'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba/ dge 'dun las 'khar ba'i sdom pa gsol na/ dge 'dun thugs brtse ba can btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse bas nye
93b7('dul ba): bar bzung ste/ bdag dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la 'khar ba'i sdom pa stsal du gsol/ de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum
94a1('dul ba): gyi bar du'o/ /de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas nas las bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam
94a2('dul ba): chung ba'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dge 'dun las 'khar ba'i sdom pa gsol te/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis
94a3('dul ba): gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong rgas te nyam chung ba'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la 'khar ba'i sdom pa stsal to/ /'di ni/ gsol ba'o//
94a4('dul ba): las ni/ 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba/ dge 'dun las
94a5('dul ba): 'khar ba'i sdom pa gsol te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la 'khar ba'i sdom pa stsol na/ tshe
94a6('dul ba): dang ldan pa gang dag / dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la 'khar ba'i sdom pa stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni/ cang ma gsungs
94a7('dul ba): shig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni/ gsungs shig /dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming
94b1('dul ba): 'di zhes bgyi ba la 'khar ba'i sdom pa stsal lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /gang la dge 'dun gyis 'khar ba'i sdom pa byin pa des 'khar ba bcang par bya ste/
94b2('dul ba): 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// //'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/ bam po drug pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs so/ /dge
94b3('dul ba): slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams dang / rlung nad can rnams bya rgod phung po'i ri la 'dzeg pa dang 'bab pa na 'dred cing rdeg 'chos nas snad par yang gyur/ bya ma bum dang / ril ba spyi
94b4('dul ba): blugs dag kyang chag go/ skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ dge slong rnams kyis dra ba bcang
94b5('dul ba): bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis dra ba bcang bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pa las byas pa'i dra ba bcangs pa dang /
94b6('dul ba): bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas 'phya bar byed do/ /skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshon
94b7('dul ba): sna lnga pa'i skud pa las byas pa'i dra ba cang bar mi bya'i/ /'on kyang tshon sna gcig pa las bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshon sna gcig las byas pa'i dra ba bcang bar bya'o/ /zhes bka'
95a1('dul ba): stsal pa dang / rgas pas nyam chung bar gtogs pa rnams dang / rlung nad can du gtogs pa rnams kyang dra ba 'chang ba la zhugs nas bcom ldan 'das
95a2('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgan po dang / rlung nad can gyis kyang dge 'dun la dra ba'i sdom pa gsol bar bya zhing / gang la dge 'dun gyis dra ba'i sdom pa byin pa des dra ba bcang bar bya'o/ /
95a3('dul ba): gsol pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams la gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dus te 'dug pa dang / dge slong rgan
95a4('dul ba): po rgas te nyam chung ba'am/ rlung nad can gyis rgan pa'i mthar tsog tsog por 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas tshig 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du
95a5('dul ba): gsol/ bdag dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am/ rlung nad can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun las dra ba'i sdom pa gsol na/ dge 'dun btsun pa thugs brtse ba can
95a6('dul ba): rnams kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste bdag dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung pa'am/ rlung nad can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la dra ba'i sdom pa stsal du gsol/ de bzhin du lan
95a7('dul ba): gnyis/ lan gsum gyi bar du'o/ /de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas nas las bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam
95b1('dul ba): chung ba'am/ rlung nad can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dge 'dun las dra ba'i sdom pa gsol na/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod
95b2('dul ba): cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am/ rlung nad can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la dra ba'i sdom pa stsol to/ /'di ni/ gsol ba'o/ /las ni/ 'di ltar bya ste/ dge
95b3('dul ba): 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am rlung nad can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba/ dge 'dun las dra ba'i sdom pa gsol te de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis
95b4('dul ba): dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am/ rlung nad can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la dra ba'i sdom pa stsol na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am/ rlung nad can ming
95b5('dul ba): 'di zhes bgyi ba la dra ba'i sdom pa stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni/ cang ma gsungs shig /gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni/ gsungs shig /dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis
95b6('dul ba): dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am/ rlung nad can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la dra ba'i sdom pa stsal lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /gang la dge 'dun gyis
95b7('dul ba): dra ba'i sdom pa byin par gyur ba des dra ba bcang bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /dge slong gzhan dag cig la 'khar ba yang dgos/ dra ba yang dgos nas de dag la dge slong rnams
96a1('dul ba): kyis 'khar ba dang / dra ba'i sdom pa so sor byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa/ 'khar ba dang / dra ba'i sdom pa gcig car du snga ma bzhin
96a2('dul ba): sbyin par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra pa na bzhugs so/ /mnyan yod na dge slong zhig 'dug pa des
96a3('dul ba): sgog skya zos nas des bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /bcom ldan 'das kyis
96a4('dul ba): dge slong de la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong / dge slong / khyod la chos bstan gyi/ rna ba gtod la 'dug cig /des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig
96a5('dul ba): tu 'dug go / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la chos bstan par brtsams te ji lta ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis de la chos bstan pa de lta de ltar dge slong de bcom ldan 'das la dris gnod
96a6('dul ba): par gyur na mi rung ngo / /snyam nas kha logs shig tu lta'o/ /lan gnyis/ lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la 'di skad ces/ dge slong / khyod la chos bstan gyi/ rna
96a7('dul ba): gtod cig / ces bka' stsal na/ dge slong de lan gnyis/ lan gsum du yang kha gzhan du bltas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi
96b1('dul ba): spyan snga nas song ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mkhyen bzhin du rmod par mdzad pa yin pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/ kun dga'
96b2('dul ba): bo/ ci'i phyir ngas ji lta ji ltar chos bstan pa de lta de ltar dge slong de kha gzhan du lta/ des gsol pa/ btsun pa/ dge slong des sgog skya 'tshal to/ /kun dga' bo/ dge slong dag gang gis
96b3('dul ba): na| bden pa rnams kyi bar chad du 'gyur ba sgog skya za ba lta/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'tshal lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ gal te dge slong 'dis de ring sgog skya zos bar ma gyur na/ deng nyid du
96b4('dul ba): 'dis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ldan nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na/ dge slong
96b5('dul ba): gis da phyin chad sgog skya dang / kun dong dang / ke'u yongs su longs spyad par mi bya ste/ yongs su longs spyad na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /yang de'i tshe/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'khor
96b6('dul ba): de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bsam pa/ dge slong 'dis de ring bden pa dag ma mthong na/ re zhig sang mthong bar 'gyur ram blta'o/ /snyam nas sems pa la zhugs pa dang / ma
96b7('dul ba): mthong ngo / /des rab kyi mtha' ba'i bsam gtan bzhi ba la rnam par bltas nas dus ji tsam na mthong bar 'gyur ba sems pa la zhugs na/ 'on kyang ma mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
97a1('dul ba): ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ dal ba'i mchog 'di 'dis bor nas/ /'di yis 'di na bden pa dag /nam yang shin tu mthong
97a2('dul ba): bar ni/ /mi 'gyur ba yi gnas de yod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i sems mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i
97a3('dul ba): bu| khyod sangs rgyas kyi yul la lag 'jug par ma byed cig / 'di ni/ 'di nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi yul las 'das pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
97a4('dul ba): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig ba dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang
97a5('dul ba): mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ston pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de'i bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams
97a6('dul ba): cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces gsungs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong dag
97a7('dul ba): sgog skya za ba las gyur gyi/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis sgog skya bza' bar mi bya'o/ /za na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis sgog skya bza' bar
97b1('dul ba): mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong zhig na ba de/ sman pa'i drung du song ste nad med cig ces byas nas smras pa/ bzhin bzang / kho bo la nad 'di lta bu zhig byung na/ sman ston
97b2('dul ba): cig / sman pas smras pa/ 'phags pa/ sgog skya gsol cig dang khyod sos par 'gyur ro/ /des smras pa/ bzhin bzang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /'phags pa/ khyod kyi
97b3('dul ba): sman 'di yin te/ gzhan gyis ni/ sos par mi nus so/ /skabs de/ dge slong rnams la smras so/ /dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
97b4('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ gal te sman pas dge slong khyod kyi sman 'di yin te/ gzhan gyis ni/ sos par mi nus so/ /zhes zer na/ bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
97b5('dul ba): kyis dge slong nad pas sman pa'i lung gis sgog skya bza'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong nad pas sgog skya zos nas gtsug lag khang la yang longs spyad par byed/ gnas mal
97b6('dul ba): dang / snam phyis dang / chab khung du yang 'jug /dge 'dun gyi nang du yang 'gro/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la yang chos ston/ mchod rten la yang phyag
97b7('dul ba): byed/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag gi khyim dag tu yang nye bar 'gro/ skyed mos tshal dang / 'dun sa dang / lha khang dang / skye bos gang ba'i phyogs gzhan dag tu yang 'dug pa dang / bram
98a1('dul ba): ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis dri tshor nas 'phya smod kha zer zhing / dge sbyong shAkya'i bu rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul nyams/ tshangs pa'i tshul nyams te/ da
98a2('dul ba): ni| rab tu byung ba rnams sgog skya za'o/ /zhes pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas dge slong
98a3('dul ba): sgog skya za ba'i kun tu spyad pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong sgog skya za bas sgog skya za bzhin du gtsug lag khang la yongs su longs spyad par mi bya/ gnas mal la ma yin/
98a4('dul ba): snam phyi sar 'jug par mi bya/ chab khung sar ma yin/ dge 'dun gyi nang du 'gro bar mi bya/ bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la chos bstan par mi bya/ mchod
98a5('dul ba): rten la phyag mi bya/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi khyim du nye bar 'gro bar mi bya/ skyed mos tshal dang / 'dun sa dang / lha khang dang / skye bos gang ba gzhan dag tu gnas
98a6('dul ba): par mi bya'i/ phyogs dben pa gang du gzhan dag gis mthong na/ ma dad pa skye bar mi 'gyur bar bza' bar bya'o/ /gang gi tshe bya ba zin par gyur pa de'i tshe phyogs de nyid du zhag
98a7('dul ba): bdun 'dug par bya'o/ /kun dong na ni/ zhag gsum/ ke'u na ni/ zhag gcig go /de nas khrus byas la chos gos dag kyang bkru bar bya zhing / bdug pa dag gis bdug par
98b1('dul ba): bya'o| |de nas dri nga ba med pa dang / gtsug lag khang du 'jug par bya zhing / ji ltar bkag pa yang bya'o/ /sgog skya za ba'i dge slong gis kun tu spyad pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa rnams
98b2('dul ba): yang dag par blangs te mi gnas na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /phran tshegs las sgo dang po rdzogs so// //bsdus pa'i sdom ni/ chan pas 'breg dang gdugs
98b3('dul ba): dang ni/ /be'u ras dang ni rgyan spel ma/ /len dang tshogs dang khrus dang ni/ /gcin dang sgo 'phar spo ba'o/ /sdom ni/ chan pas 'breg dang mdoms dang ni/ /de bzhin byin pa nyid dang ni/ /
98b4('dul ba): khri dang rtsa stan gcig dang ni/ /khyim na gnas dang bgo ba min/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs
98b5('dul ba): so/ /gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal phul ba de'i tshe des 'phags pa rnams kyi skra dang / kha spu bregs shig ces 'breg
98b6('dul ba): mkhan gyi mi btang ba dang zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /nye dga' bos smras pa/ bzhin bzang / khyod skra chan pas 'breg shes sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ de nyid bdag gi
98b7('dul ba): bzo lags so/ /bzhin bzang / gal te de lta na/ tshur shog /bregs shig /des skra chan pas bregs pa dang / nye dga' bos smras pa/ da dung bregs shig /des yang bregs pa dang /
99a1('dul ba): des smras pa/ da dung yang bregs shig /des yang bregs so/ /de bzhin du ji tsam nyi ma nub kyi bar du ma btang nas de'i 'og tu 'di skad ces smras te/ bkren pa/
99a2('dul ba): khyod ci yang mi shes pa zhig /'di kho na bzhin mnyam par byos te song zhig ces bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis skra chan pas breg
99a3('dul ba): par mi bya'o/ /dge slong skra chan pas 'breg na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis skra chan pas breg par mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge
99a4('dul ba): slong dag gi mgo la rma byung nas spu gris reg pa na de dag snang ba'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rma'i
99a5('dul ba): than kor gyi skra chan pas breg par bya zhing / lhag ma rnams spu gris breg par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin
99a6('dul ba): gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis 'breg mkhan gyi mi btang ste zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /bzhin bzang / mdoms kyi
99a7('dul ba): phyogs kyi spu 'breg shes sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ de nyid bdag gi bzo lags so/ /bzhin bzang / gal te na de lta na/ tshur shog /bregs shig /'phags pa/ ji
99b1('dul ba): 'dra bar breg / bzhin bzang / mdzes par bregs shig /des breg par brtsams pa dang / nye dgas smras pa/ bzhin bzang / 'di ltar byos shig /des de bzhin byas pa dang / yang
99b2('dul ba): smras pa/ gzhan 'di lta bur yang byos shig /ces des de ji tsam nyi ma nub kyi bar du ma btang nas dge sbyong shAkya'i sras rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni/ nyams/ tshangs pa'i tshul ni/ nyams
99b3('dul ba): te/ da ni/ gsang ba'i phyogs kyi spu yang 'breg par byed do/ /zhes smod par byed/ gzhogs 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la
99b4('dul ba): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis mdoms kyi phyogs kyi spu breg par mi bya'o/ /dge slong mdoms kyi phyogs kyi spu 'breg par byed na/
99b5('dul ba): 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis mdoms kyi phyogs kyi spu breg par mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gi mdoms kyi phyogs su rma
99b6('dul ba): byung ba dang / dge slong dag 'gyod nas spu 'breg par mi byed do/ /dge slong gzhan dag la yang srin bu byung ste/ de dag de'i gnod pas dge ba'i phyogs kyi bya ba mi nus pa'i skabs de/ dge
99b7('dul ba): slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag la bstan nas rma'am/ srin bu'i phyir ni/ mdoms
100a1('dul ba): kyi phyogs kyi spu breg par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi
100a2('dul ba): kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis 'breg mkhan gyi mi btang ba dang zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /bzhin bzang / khyod byin
100a3('dul ba): spu 'breg shes sam/ 'phags pa/ de nyid bdag gi bzo lags so/ /bzhin bzang / gal te de lta na/ tshur shog/ bregs shig /'phags pa/ ci 'dra bar breg par bgyi/
100a4('dul ba): bzhin bzang / mdzes par bregs shig /des breg par brtsams pa dang / nye dga' bos smras pa/ bzhin bzang / 'di ltar byos shig /des de bzhin byas pa dang / yang smras
100a5('dul ba): pa| gzhan 'di ltar yang byos shig / des de ji tsam nam sros kyi bar du ma btang bas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis de la zhes bya ba nas dris pa/ zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma
100a6('dul ba): bzhin no/ /des ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang / de smod par byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
100a7('dul ba): de lta bas na/ dge slong gis byin spu breg par mi bya'o/ /dge slong byin spu 'breg par byed na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na spre'u
100b1('dul ba): rdzing gi 'gram khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis byin spu breg par mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams kyi brla la rma byung
100b2('dul ba): zhing / dge slong gzhan dag la srin bu byung nas de dag de'i gnod pas dge ba'i phyogs bya bar mi nus par gyur pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa
100b3('dul ba): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rma byung ba'i phyir ram/ srin bu'i phyir ni/ byin spu breg par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan
100b4('dul ba): yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /drug sde rnams khri gcig la nyal bar byed cing / de dag der nyal nas ku re byed/ rtse bar byed/ ca co
100b5('dul ba): smra bar byed/ rgod pa dang / 'phyar g.yeng dang / lus la rdeg par byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/
100b6('dul ba): nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong rnams khri gcig la nyal bar byed pa las gyur pas/ de'i phyir dge slong gzhan dang lhan cig khri gcig la nyan du mi gzhug go /snyam
100b7('dul ba): du dgongs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /khyed kyis deng phyin chad dge slong gis khri gcig la nyal bar mi bya'o/ /byed na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /
101a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis khri gcig la nyal bar mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / ji tsam na dge slong mang po rnams ljongs rgyu zhing dong
101a2('dul ba): ste/ ljongs rgyu ba na ri brag gcig tu phyin nas de dag gis der khri brnyas pa dang de dag gis khri dag byin no/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di dag nyung gi/ gzhan yang bsnams te spyon
101a3('dul ba): cig / de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag/ bdag cag ni/ khri re re la skye bo mang po dag nyal bar bgyid na/ khyed gzhan yang g.yor ram/ re re la gnyis sam/ gsum
101a4('dul ba): gzims par mdzod cig / de rnams kyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khri gcig la gnyis sam/ gsum nyal du ma gnang na/ ji ltar nyal bar bya/ de dag gis smras pa/
101a5('dul ba): 'phags pa dag /khri gzhan ni/ ma mchis/ de skad smras pas cang mi smra bar 'khod pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
101a6('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gang dag ngo tsha shes shing 'gyod pa dang ldan la/ bslab pa 'dod pa de dag gis dran pa nye bar bzhag ste gding ba bting la bar du chos gos kyi gtur
101a7('dul ba): bu'am/ lhung bzed kyi snod dag bcug la nyal bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /khri la ji lta bar rtswa stan dang / gzhan dag la yang de dang 'dra'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
101b1('dul ba): 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong mang po rnams ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba dang / ri brag cig tu phyin nas de rnams
101b2('dul ba): kyis khyim bdag cig las bsti gnas brnyas so/ /grang ba'i dus la bab pas de rnams kyis gos brnyas pa dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis 'di dag ni/ rab tu byung ba
101b3('dul ba): yin no/ /snyam ste/ snying rje nye bar bzhag ste gos dag byin pa dang / gang gis gang thob pa das de gyon te nyal nas dge slong gzhan dag grang bas sbrebs par gyur pa'i skabs de/ dge
101b4('dul ba): slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gis gang thob pa de dag nyid kyis bgo bar mi bya'i/ thams cad kyis bgo bar bya ste/
101b5('dul ba): gcig rnyed par gyur pa gang yin pa des thams cad kyi steng du rgan rim bzhin ji tsam yog pa dag ba par bya'o/ /ji tsam na ri brag gzhan zhig tu song ba dang gos gcig cig rnyed nas da
101b6('dul ba): dag gis steng du g.yogs pa na/ nye dgas de gyon te 'chag tu song ba dang / dge slong rnams grang bas sdug bsngal bar gyur nas smras pa/ btsun pa nye dga' bo/ bdag cag ni/ grang
101b7('dul ba): bas sdug bsngal na/ khyod 'ba' zhig gyon nas 'chag gam/ des smras pa/ kho bos bkag gam ci/ khyed kyang ci phyir mi 'chag /de rnams grang ba'i sdug bsngal gyis mtshan 'das par gyur
102a1('dul ba): pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'chag pa gang yin pa des gang zag
102a2('dul ba): gi gos bgos te bcag par mi bya'o/ /gzhan gyis 'chag na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas
102a3('dul ba): sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /grang ba'i dus la bab pas dge slong rnams grang ba'i gnod pas glos phab ste 'dug go/ ji tsam na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gtsug lag
102a4('dul ba): khang du 'ongs ba dang / des de dag mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /ci'i slad du gcig tu brtson pa'i gsung rab la glos phab ste bzhugs shing / dge ba'i phyogs dag mi mdzad/ de
102a5('dul ba): dag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag/ bde ba dang ldan pa dag ni/ chos dran par 'gyur gyi/ kho bo cag shin tu grang bas sdug bsngal bar gyur to/ /des khyim du song nas be'u ras lnga brgya
102a6('dul ba): bkur ba dang / dge slong rnams kyis khyim pa'i gos de dag bgos te phyi rol tu dong ba bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas co 'dri zhing smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /ci/
102a7('dul ba): khyed babs sam/ de dag gis smras pa/ kho bo cag grang bar gyur nas bgyis kyi/ tshe dang ldan pa dag de skad ma zer cig/ de rnams smod par byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis
102b1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis khyim pa'i gos bgo bar mi bya'o/ /de lta bu'i rkyen zhig byung na/ steng du gos ngur smrig gis
102b2('dul ba): g.yogs nas bgo bar bya'o/ /dge 'dun gyi yang de bzhin du gyon par byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi ni/ 'og tu gos bcug nas steng nas g.yogs te bgo
102b3('dul ba): bar bya'i/ gzhan du na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sdom ni/ gdugs dang 'jig rten rgyang pan dang / /bsdebs sbyar de bzhin nags me dang / /gnas med par ni lam dag dang / /la
102b4('dul ba): ba bgos pas mi bcag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan yod na bram ze gos
102b5('dul ba): spyod pa zhig 'dug pa des gos byas shing byas shing 'tshong bar byed do/ /dus gzhan zhig na des gos mang po rnyed par gyur nas des bsam pa/ thabs ji lta bu zhig byas na/ des bsod nams
102b6('dul ba): kyang 'thob cing / rnyed pa yang 'grub par 'gyur snyam pa dang / de dad pa can zhig pas de'i blo skyes te/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs la gos kyi gdan bshams
102b7('dul ba): te gdugs tshod gsol lo/ /de ltar byas na/ gos kyang yongs su longs spyad par 'gyur la/ gos yongs su longs spyad pa dang / zhal zas yongs su longs spyad pas bsod nams chen po yang
103a1('dul ba): 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /snyam du rig nas des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rang gi khyim du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs nas zhal zas
103a2('dul ba): gtsang zhing bsod pa bshams te gdan dag gi steng du gos bting ngo / /de nas gdan bshams zin pa dang bcom ldan 'das spyan 'dren gyis spyan drangs na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun ni/
103a3('dul ba): gshegs/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ gtsug lag khang na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms drangs so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ rgyu rnam pa lngas gtsug lag khang na bzhugs
103a4('dul ba): shing bsod snyoms 'dren te/ lnga gang zhe na/ nang du yang dag 'jog bzhed par gyur pa dang / lha rnams la chos ston bzhed par gyur pa dang / nad pa gzigs bzhed par gyur pa
103a5('dul ba): dang / gnas mal gzigs bzhed par gyur pa dang / nyan thos rnams 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed pa'o/ /don 'di la ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos
103a6('dul ba): rnams 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed nas gtsug lag khang na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms drangs so/ /dge slong rnams lam gar char pa bab nas de dag gi gos
103a7('dul ba): char pas gsher bzhin du 'khod pas/ gang gi gos ci 'dra bas 'khod pa de'i de kho na lta bu'i sbra sbre byung bar gyur pa bram ze des mthong ba dang / 'khrugs nas smras pa/ bdag
103b1('dul ba): gi zang 'di lta bu dag zong du mi rung bar bgyis kyi/ gos 'di dag khyed thal byung snoms shig /ces zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
103b2('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /bram ze des ma dad ba skyes nas byin pas blang bar mi bya'o/ /de 'khrugs pa de dang bral nas yang des dad pa'i sems kyis phul ba'i skabs de/

103b5('dul ba): gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te de lta na/ rjes su gnang ste/ dge slong dag gis gdugs bcang bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan
103b6('dul ba): 'das kyis dge slong dag gis gdugs bcang par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis gdugs kyi rtsa ba gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel las byas shing /
103b7('dul ba): gzhan yang bkra zhing nye bar bkra ba dang / bsrubs las byas la/ gdugs ni/ dkar po dang / rma bya'i mdongs dag las byas pa dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas
104a1('dul ba): de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag/ 'di ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gdugs gnang ngo / /'phags pa dag/ dge sbyong khyed ci 'dong pa'i
104a2('dul ba): yon tan gyis gzir tam/ gang gi phyir 'di 'dra ba'i gdugs dag 'chang / de dag gis smras pa/ dgra bo rnams kyi mgrin pa rdog bas mnan nas 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis gzir
104a3('dul ba): to/ /de dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bu'i gdugs dag bcang bar mi
104a4('dul ba): bya'i/ 'on kyang rtsa ba ru ta dang / lo ma las byas pa'i gdugs rnam gnyis bcang bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gdugs rnam gnyis bcang bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang /

104a6('dul ba): bu nor can nam/ tshong dpon nam/ ded dpon nam/ su zhig 'ong zhes langs nas rtog par byed do/ /kha cig bsur dong ba dang / gang gi tshe mthong bar gyur pa de'i tshe ma dad par gyur pa'i
104a7('dul ba): skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gdugs kyi rtsa ba ring po ring por mi bya'i/ 'on kyang lus kyi tshad tsam
104b1('dul ba): gyi rtsa ba gdags par bya zhing / grong gi nang du gdugs thogs te 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis grong gi nang du gdugs thogs te 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa

104b3('dul ba): nang du gdugs thogs te 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pas/ grong dor bar bya'o/ /snyam nas de dag gis grong spangs pa dang / don mthun rnams dang bral bas chom bos bcom
104b4('dul ba): pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te grong gi dbus su lam byung bar gyur na/ gdugs glor
104b5('dul ba): bsnyal nas 'dong bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /bsod snyoms pa rnams bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / char pa bab nas char chus gos gsher bar gyur pa'i skabs de/

104b7('dul ba): gal te char pa chad na/ gdugs khyim dang por bzhag la 'jug par bya zhing / de nas phyir blangs te 'gro bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal
105a1('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /lho phyogs kyi yul nas kun tu rgyu 'jig rten rgyang phan pa 'char pa zhes bya ba zhig ljongs rgyu zhing mnyan
105a2('dul ba): yod du 'ongs so/ /de ngal bsos nas tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+ya ga la pa der song ste phyin nas smras pa/ kye dge slong / kho bos bla ma dag las blangs pa'i yi ge cung zad yod de/
105a3('dul ba): de'i phyir khyod dang lhan cig gtam bya bar 'dod do/ /des de la smras pa/ bram ze/ kho bo smra ba ma yin gyi/ song zhig/ de tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang / bzang po dang / rlangs pa dang / ming
105a4('dul ba): chen dang / grags pa dang / gang po dang / dri med dang / ba lang bdag dang / lag bzang ga la ba der song ba dang / de rnams kyis kyang de kho na skad smras so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
105a5('dul ba): bu ga la ba der song ste phyin nas smras pa/ kye dge slong / kho bos bla ma las yi ge cung zad blangs pa dag yod de/ de'i phyir khyod dang lhan cig gtam bya bar 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa
105a6('dul ba): shA ri'i bus bsam pa/ ci/ kun tu rgyu 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba cung zad yod dam/ 'on te med snyam na/ yod par mthong ngo / /su la rag las brtags na/ bdag nyid la'o/ /ci/ smra bas
105a7('dul ba): 'dul ba gzhan cung zad yod dam snyam na/ yod par mthong ngo / /ji tsam na tshogs pa brtags na/ zhag bdun tshun chad kyis tshogs par shes nas smras pa/ legs te/ de bzhin bya
105b1('dul ba): na/ rig pa'i gnas gang du bya/ che ge mo zhig tu'o/ /smra ba'i zhal che ba bzhag ste phyogs snga ma dang / phyi ma rnam par bzhag nas phyogs snga ma sus gzugs zhes gleng pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa

105b3('dul ba): ni/ mi rigs so/ /'di ni/ mi 'dra'o/ /'di ni/ mi 'thad do/ /zhes skyon brtags so/ /des yang smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus mjug tu ma phyin bar bzhag go/ lho phyogs kyi yul
105b4('dul ba): nas kun tu rgyu 'jig rten rgyang pan pa 'char pa zhes bya ba zhig mnyan yod du 'ongs te de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang lhan cig brtsad nas deng du zhag bdun lon no/ /zhes kun tu sgra grags pa
105b5('dul ba): dang / srog chags brgya phrag mang po dag kha cig ni/ ya mtshan skyes/ kha cig ni/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis bskul nas 'dus pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsam pa/
105b6('dul ba): bdag gi smra bas 'dul ba 'dus sam snyam na/ 'dus par mthong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus ma lus par smras pa dang / kun tu rgyu de tshar bcad do/ /de nas mngon par dad

106a1('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/ /de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus rab tu phyung / bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te gdams ngag byin no/ /des brtsal
106a2('dul ba): ba dang / 'bad pa dang / bsgrim pa byas pas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang / mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste zhes bya ba nas gus par smra bar bya bar gyur to/ /zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma
106a3('dul ba): bzhin no/ /de nas 'khod de dag 'phags pa shA ri'i bus 'di lta bu'i smra ba chen po pham par byas so/ /zhes shin tu ya mtshan skyes so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'khor de dag gi

107a1('dul ba): sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab gdon par bya ste/ phyi rol pa'i bstan bcos ni/ ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi

109a1('dul ba): gsar bu des smras pa/ gnas brtan/ bka' 'bab par mi 'gyur na/ re zhig cung zad cig gsol ba mchis so/ /tshe dang ldan pa/ 'di la su zhig gshe /smros
109a2('dul ba): shig / gnas brtan/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun ma gzigs sam/ ci/ rmongs pa'i yo byad 'dis ci zhig bgyi/ bzhin bzang / gal te mi bkur ba ni/ re zhig rung

109a4('dul ba): pa 'di/ mi dga' bar bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /ji tsam na/ de gnyis gtsug lag khang du dong ba dang / de na nub gcig kyang mi gnas par 'dug par mi bya ba'i khrims su bya ba yod de/ de gnyis la
109a5('dul ba): gnas mal gyi zhal ta byed pas/ gnas mal dag snoms shig ces smras pa dang / rgan pos ni/ blangs so/ /gsar bu des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ kho bos gnas ma bcas kyi/
109a6('dul ba): je gnas gsol lo/ /zhes de dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi gan du song ste rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/ gnas brtan/ bdag gi gnas mdzad du gsol/ des smras pa/
109a7('dul ba): bzhin bzang / khyod su dang lhan cig 'ongs/ gnas brtan dge slong che ge mo zhig dang ngo / /bzhin bzang / de dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis bdag 'khor dang phye'o/ /zhes zer du 'ong
109b1('dul ba): gi| song la de nyid la gnas gsol cig / de gzhan dag gi gan du song ba dang / thams cad kyis de bzhin spangs nas nam sros te rgan po de nyid kyi gan du song nas sgo la brdabs te smras pa/
109b2('dul ba): gnas brtan phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod su zhig/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba de lags so/ /khyod nad med par gyur cig /gnas brtan/ gtsug lag khang 'di na nub gcig kyang mi gnas
109b3('dul ba): par mchis par mi bgyi ba'i khrims su mdzad pa mchis na/ bdag gi gnas mdzad du gsol/ bzhin bzang / dge 'dun gyis de lta bu'i khrims su bca' ba mdzad pa legs te/ gal te
109b4('dul ba): ma mdzad na/ kho bos 'char gzhug pa zhig /de'i tshe ni/ kho bo snod mang zhing yo byad mang ba yin la/ da ni/ gnas brtan yin nam/ khyod ma gus pa byas kyang gnas ster ba gang yin pa de la
109b5('dul ba): gnas chos shig / de spobs pa med par gyur nas cang mi smra bar 'dug ste/ de'i gnas bar chad du gyur pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan
109b6('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas med par ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro bar mi bya/ dge slong gis seng ge bzhin gtum por mi bya/ dge 'dun gyis kyang dge slong rnams la gnod par 'gyur ba'i
109b7('dul ba): khrims bca' bar mi bya ste/ dge slong gnas ma bcas par ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro'am/ seng ge bzhin gtum por byed dam/ dge 'dun gyi khrims su bya ba de lta bu bcas na/ thams cad 'gal
110a1('dul ba): tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zham 'bring ba tshe dang ldan pa klu skyong dang yul ma ga d+har ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te grong khyer sa dkar can du
110a2('dul ba): gshegs nas dkar can na gnod sbyin ba ku la'i gnas na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das mtshan mo nam sros te mun gnag cing khad kyis cung zad char 'bab cing glog 'byung ba
110a3('dul ba): na| bla gab med pa'i 'chag sa na 'chag pa mdzad do/ /chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi zham 'bring ba dge slong rnams ni/ ji srid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
110a4('dul ba): nang du yang dag 'jog la mi bzhugs pa de srid du nang du yang dag 'jog la mi 'jug go/ brgya byin lha'i dbang po'i shes pa dang / mthong ba ni/ 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas des bsam pa/
110a5('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de grong khyer sa dkar can na sa dkar can gyi ri la gnod sbyin ba ku la'i gnas na bzhugs shing / de mtshan mo nam sros te mun gnag cing khad kyis cung zad
110a6('dul ba): cung zad char 'bab cing glog 'byung na/ bla gab med pa'i 'chag sa na 'chag ste/ ma la bdag der nye bar 'gro'o/ /snyam du rig nas bai DUR+Ya las byas pa'i dri gtsang khang mngon par sprul
110a7('dul ba): te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das 'chag pa mdzad pa'i zham 'bring na 'chag cing 'dug go / de'i tshe yul ma ga d+ha pa'i mi rnams khye'u dang / bu mo ngu ba
110b1('dul ba): gang yin pa de dag la de rnams gnod sbyin ba ku la'i ming gis bsdigs par byed do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa klu skyong gis 'di snyam du bsam ste/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das ha cang yun ring du bla gab
110b2('dul ba): med pa'i 'chag sa na 'chag pa mdzad pas/ ma la bdag gis de la gnod sbyin ba ku las bsdigs so/ /snyam du rig nas la ba ldog ste bgos nas 'chag pa'i slad du 'dug ste bcom
110b3('dul ba): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /ba ku la/ ba ku la/ dge sbyong / nga ni/ gnod sbyin ba ku la yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa klu skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
110b4('dul ba): to| |mi blun po/ khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la gnod sbyin ba ku las bsdigs par sems sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ bsnyengs
110b5('dul ba): pa dang / bag tsha ba dang bral ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyengs pa'am/ zhum pa'am/ spu zing zhes byed pa mi mnga'o/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin ma dad par gyur nas
110b6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ chos 'dul ba 'di la 'di 'dra ba'i gang zag kyang mchis sam/ ko'u shi ka/ khyod sdod cig /go'u ta ma'i rigs ni/ rgya che ba yin
110b7('dul ba): pas/ 'di yang phyis rnam par dag pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong dag la ba ldog ste gyon pa las gyur par
111a1('dul ba): mkhyen nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ mi blun po klu skyong gis la ba ldog ste bgos nas de bzhin gshegs pa la/ ba ku la/ ba ku
111a2('dul ba): la/ dge sbyong / nga ni/ gnod sbyin ba ku la yin no/ /zhes zer te/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis la ba ldog ste bgo bar mi bya'o/ /gyon na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan
111a3('dul ba): 'das kyis dge slong gis la ba ldog ste bgo bar mi bya'o/ /gyon na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /zhes bka' stsal pa/ dge slong ba lang gi gnas na 'khod pa de dag gis der la
111a4('dul ba): ba'i bgo ba dag rnyed pa dang / de dag la shig zhugs te dge slong rnams shig gis zos pas/ bde ba mi thob pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa
111a5('dul ba): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ la ba ldog ste gyon pas 'dug par bya'o/ /nyal bar bya'i/ bcag par ni/ mi bya'o/ /sdom ni/ be'u ras dang ni la ba dang / de
111a6('dul ba): bzhin la ba'i mchog dang ni/ /sgrog mig sgrog rten mdud pa dang / /ska rags dag ni gsum yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon
111a7('dul ba): med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ gal te dge 'dun la be'u ras grub na yang gnang
111b1('dul ba): la/ gang zag la yang gnang ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs shing snga ma bzhin te/ dge 'dun la
111b2('dul ba): la ba grub na yang gnang la/ gang zag la yang gnang ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs shing snga ma
111b3('dul ba): bzhin te/ dge 'dun la la ba mchog grub na yang gnang la/ gang zag la yang gnang ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
111b4('dul ba): dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan yod na dge slong bsod snyoms pa zhig 'dug pa de/ snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/ lhung bzed thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir
111b5('dul ba): zhugs so/ /de bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ba na chos gos nar nas des myur ba myur bar lhung bzed sa la bzhag nas de tshags byas pa dang / de bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas
111b6('dul ba): 'phya zhing dge sbyong shAkya'i bu rnams ni/ gtsang sbra med de/ lhung bzed bab bab tu 'jog go /zhes zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom
111b7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis lhung bzed bab bab tu bzhag par mi bya'o/ /dge slong lhung bzed bab bab tu 'jog na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /'on kyang chos
112a1('dul ba): gos bsrung ba'i phyir chos gos kyi sgrog mig gdags par bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis btags pa dang / des chos gos ral nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
112a2('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ sgrog zungs kyis glon la thogs shig /dge slong rnams kyis sgrog zungs kyis glan nas btags pa dang / de sgrog mdud med pas/ ma chags te/ nyes dmigs de
112a3('dul ba): nyid du gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdud pa bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
112a4('dul ba): dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan yod na dge slong bsod snyoms pa zhig 'dug pa de/ snga dro sham thabs dang / chos gos bgos lhung bzed thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms
112a5('dul ba): kyi phyir zhugs so/ /de bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ba dang / smad g.yogs bsnyil ba dang / des myur ba myur bar lhung bzed sa la bzhag ste de tshags bcos so/ /bram ze dang / khyim bdag
112a6('dul ba): rnams kyis mthong nas zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos gos bsrung ba'i phyir ska rags rnam pa gsum po/ shur bu dang / shur bu phre'u dang /
112a7('dul ba): lcag phod bcang bar bya'o// //'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/ bam po bdun pa/ sdom ni/ ston pa ser skya'i gnas bzhugs pas/ rgyan spel ma dang 'phyang 'phrul
112b1('dul ba): can| |zla gam dang ni gser skud can/ /khra bo thams cad bkag pa yin/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas na n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe shAkya ming chen gyi
112b2('dul ba): khyim gyi zhal ta pa dus las 'das pa dang / ri brag na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs/ shAkya ming chen ga la ba der song ste smras pa/ rje/ khyod kyi khab kyi zhal ta pa gum na/ zhal ta pa gzhan zhig
112b3('dul ba): bsko bar gsol/ des de'i drung na bram ze'i khye'u zhig 'dug pa de la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u/ re zhig khyod song zhig /ji tsam na zhal ta pa gzhan zhig btang ngo / /de song nas des chos bzhin
112b4('dul ba): du rigs par spyad pas/ dpya nar ma dang / bla skyes rab tu mang por phul ba dang / shAkya ming chen gyis smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u/ dpya nar ma dang / bla skyes 'di ltar mang ba/ khyod kyis skye bo'i
112b5('dul ba): tshogs la gnod par ma byas grang / des smras pa/ rje dpya nar ma dang / bla skyes 'di rigs pas mchis pa lags te/ bdag gis skye bo'i tshogs la gnod pa bgyis pa ma lags so/ /des ri
112b6('dul ba): brag na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs de la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /bram ze'i khye'u 'dis/ khyed 'ga' la gnod pa ma byas grang / rje/ dpya nar ma dang / bla skyes 'di rigs pas mchis pa lags
112b7('dul ba): so| |'dis 'ga' la yang gnod pa ma bgyis so/ /zhes smras pa dang / des de ri brag gi zhal ta par bcug go/ /'jig rten ni/ 'byor pa 'dod cing / rgud pa dang mi mthun pa yin pas/ de la bram
113a1('dul ba): ze gzhan zhig gis bu mo byin pa dang / des de nyi ma dang / tshes grangs dang / yud tsam dang sbyar nas bag mar blangs so/ /de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar
113a2('dul ba): byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed de/ de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/ bu khye'u zhig btsas te/ de btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas rigs dang
113a3('dul ba): mthun pa'i ming btags so/ /yang de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/ bu mo zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston yang rgya cher byas nas ming zla ba zhes bya bar btags so/ /de
113a4('dul ba): bskyed bsrings te chen mor gyur pa dang / de mkhas shing spyod lam dang / 'gro 'dug 'o bze bas/ ri brag na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyi yid du 'ong bar gyur to/ /ji tsam
113a5('dul ba): dus gzhan zhig na bram ze'i khye'u de na bar gyur nas/ rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu'i sman gyis rim gro byas kyang / nad de zhi bar ma gyur nas ri brag pa
113a6('dul ba): des dpya nar ma dang / bla skyes phul ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad spyad cing / skyin po gzhan dag blangs nas 'on kyang sos par ma gyur nas de de nyid du dus las 'das so/ /ri brag na gnas
113a7('dul ba): pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dag shAkya ming chen ga la ba der 'ongs te smras pa/ rje/ zhal ta pa de ni/ gum lags so/ /des smras pa/ shes ldan dag /de na dpya nar ma dang / bla skyes su phul ba yod
113b1('dul ba): dam/ rje/ te por mang du phul mod kyi/ des bro 'tshal ba'i yo byad du spyad na/ 'on kyang sos par ma gyur nas skyin po gzhan dag kyang bgyis so/ /dengs la de na lhag ma cung zad ci yod pa des bu
113b2('dul ba): lon sobs shig / rje/ de na cung zad kyang ma mchis te/ lus par btab na/ de'i mchis brang dang / bu pho dang / bu mo mchis te/ de'i bu mo de mkhas shing spyod lam dang / 'gro 'dug 'o bze ba
113b3('dul ba): lags pas/ ri brag na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyi yid du mchi bar gyur to/ /ming chen gyi smras pa/ shes ldan dag /de'i chung ma dang / bu pho dag ci dgar thong la/ bu mo de 'dir
113b4('dul ba): khug cig / de rnams kyis de'i chung ma dang / bu pho de dag ci dgar btang nas bu mo de ming chen gyi gan du khrid do/ /shAkya ming chen gyi chung ma rgan mo zhig kha zas g.yo ba dang / me tog 'thu ba'i
113b5('dul ba): las rnam gnyis byed pa des smras pa/ jo bo/ de ni/ bdag shin tu rgas pas sug las rnam gnyis bgyid rngo mi thogs na/ zla ba 'di bdag gi ngan grogs su bskor gsol/ des de ngan grogs su
113b6('dul ba): bskos so/ /des de la smras pa/ zla ba/ khyod ni/ kun dga' ra bar song la me tog thus shig /ngas ni/ kha zas g.yo'o/ /de kun dga' ra bar song nas me tog btus te/ de nas phreng ba legs
113b7('dul ba): par brgyus nas ming chen gyi gan du song ba dang / des mthong nas yongs su dga' ste smras pa/ legs so/ /zhog cig ces smras nas chung ma rgan mo de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ci'i phyir sngon ni/
114a1('dul ba): me tog nyung la/ de ring mang bar gyur/ des smras pa/ sngon ni/ khyod kyi gnyen dag mchis nas bdag la slong ba na/ bdag gis de dag la stsal la/ 'dis ni/
114a2('dul ba): su la yang ma stsal pa dang / bdag ni/ rgas pas mig rtul la/ 'di ni/ mig rno bas 'thu mkhas pa las gyur to/ /des smras pa/ gal te de lta na/ de kun dga' ra bar thong la der zhog
114a3('dul ba): cig / des de kun dga' ra ba de nyid du bzhag pa dang / de me tog gi phreng ba bzang po rgyud par byed pas/ de'i ming phreng ldan ma zhes bya bar grags so/ /dus gzhan de khyim nas rang
114a4('dul ba): gi zan blangs te kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyang bsod snyoms la gshegs so/ /des bcom ldan 'das sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas shin tu bde
114a5('dul ba): zhing rab tu dga' bas rtog par byed cing bsam pa/ 'di lta bu'i yon gnas yang dag pa la bdag gis bya ba ma byas pas/ des na bdag 'di lta bu'i gnas skabs su gyur par
114a6('dul ba): gdon mi za'o/ /de'i phyir gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag las bsod snyoms bzhes na/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la dbul lo/ /snyam pa dang / skabs de lta bu la/
114a7('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mi mkhyen pa dang / mi gzigs pa dang / mi rig pa dang / rnam par mi mkhyen pa ci yang mi mnga' bas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la
114b1('dul ba): ni| chos nyid kyis zhes bya ba nas/ lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin/ /zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rjes su gzung ba'i phyir lhung bzed bzed
114b2('dul ba): de| sring mo/ khyod kyi gal te yongs su btang na/ lhung bzed 'dir byin cig /ces bka' stsal pa dang / des shin tu dad pas bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyoms de phul nas zhabs gnyis
114b3('dul ba): la phyag 'tshal te smon lam btab pa/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bran mo dang / dbul por mi 'gyur ba shog cig /ji tsam na/ de'i pha'i grogs po bram ze mtshan mkhan zhig yod pa
114b4('dul ba): des de mthong nas smras pa/ bu mo/ khyod ga las 'ongs/ ri brag de kho na nas so/ /su la gnas shing 'dug /des smras pa/ gang na skal pa chung ngu gnas pa na ste/ bdag ming chen gyi bran mor
114b5('dul ba): bgyis so/ /khyod kyi pha de gar song / gum mo/ /ma dang / ming pho de dag gar dong / gar mchis ma 'tshal to/ /zla ba/ khyod bran mo'i 'os ma yin na/ lag pa rkyongs shig dang blta'o/ /des
114b6('dul ba): lag pa brkyang pa dang / des bltas nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gang gi lag pa'i mthil dag la/ /lcags kyi 'khor lo'i mtshan yod pa/ /bran gyi rigs su skyes gyur kyang / /rgyal
114b7('dul ba): po'i btsun mor bzhes par 'gyur/ /gang gi bzhin ni rgyas pa dang / /ngang pa'i rgyal po'i gdangs 'dra ba/ /bran gyi rigs su skyes gyur kyang / /rgyal po'i btsun mor bzhes par 'gyur/ /
115a1('dul ba): gang gi rkang pa'i mthil dgal/ /grong khyer lcog dang rta babs bcas/ /bran gyi rigs su skyes gyur kyang / /rgyal po'i btsun mor bzhes par 'gyur/ /khyod mi
115a2('dul ba): dga' ba ma byed par song zhig dang / khyod bran mor mi 'gyur gyi/ khyod rgyal po'i btsun mor 'gyur ro/ /de gnas de nas skyed mos tshal du song ba dang / yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal
115a3('dul ba): rgyal ri drags shor du song ba/ rtas kha khyer te gcig pu ser skya'i gnas su phyin to/ /de phan tshun 'khyams pa las/ ming chen gyi kun dga' ra bar song nas des bu mo de la dris pa/ bu
115a4('dul ba): mo/ 'di su'i kun dga' ra ba yin/ des smras pa/ lha/ shAkya ming chen gyi lags so/ /des rta las babs te/ smras pa/ bu mo/ rkang pa bkru'i/ chu longs shig /des shin tu myur
115a5('dul ba): bar rdzing bur song ste nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis bsros pa'i chu blangs pa dang / des rkang pa bkrus nas yud tsam zhig bsdad te smras pa/ bu mo/ gdong bkru'i chu longs shig /des chu'i steng
115a6('dul ba): rim lag pas bsal te/ chu ha cang dro ba yang ma yin/ ha cang grang ba yang ma yin pa blangs nas des gdong bkrus so/ /des yang smras pa/ bu mo/ btung dgos kyi/ chu longs shig
115a7('dul ba): des chu rnam par glongs te chu bsil pa lo ma'i snod du blangs pa/ rgyal pos 'thungs nas smras pa/ bu mo/ /kun dga' ra ba 'di na rdzing bu gsum yod dam/ ci na khyod kyis chu rnam pa gsum
115b1('dul ba): khyer te 'ongs/ des smras pa/ lha/ 'di na rdzing bu gcig kho na mchis kyi/ gsum ni/ ma mchis so/ /des smras pa/ 'o na khyod kyis chu rnam pa gsum ga las khyer te 'ongs/ des ji ltar
115b2('dul ba): gyur pa brjod pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ de ni/ go'o/ /'di 'dri bar bya ste/ ci'i phyir khyod kyis chu rnam pa gsum khyer te 'ongs/ des smras pa/ lha/ bdag gis dang por chab dron po
115b3('dul ba): 'tshal te mchis pa ni/ lha/ mnyel sos par bgyi ba'i slad du'o/ /slad kyi ha cang dro ba yang ma lags/ ha cang grang ba yang ma lags pa 'tshal te mchis pa ni/ dro ba dang / grang ba gang
115b4('dul ba): lags pa dag spyan la gnod pa spang ba'i slad du'o/ /rnam par glongs nas shin tu bsil ba 'tshal te mchis pa ni/ lha skyems pa dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du'o/ /des bsam pa/ bu mo
115b5('dul ba): 'di ni/ mkhas pa yin no/ /snyam du rig nas smras pa/ bu mo mdzangs shing mkhas pa khyod/ rkang pa mnye dgos kyi/ re zhig mal chos shig /des de'i rkang pa mnyes pa dang / de reg bya dang ldan
115b6('dul ba): pa yin pas/ mnyes ma thag nyid du de gnyid log /de gnyid log pa dang / des bsam pa/ rgyal po 'di dag la ni/ dgra mang bas/ gal te 'di gnyid log pa la/ 'ga' zhig gis
115b7('dul ba): gnod pa byas na/ nges par bdag gi rje bo la grags pa ma yin par 'gyur bas/ sgo gcad par bya'o/ /snyam nas des sgo bcad de 'dug pa dang / ji tsam na gcig nas gcig tu thos te
116a1('dul ba): dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dag skyed mos tshal der lhags nas de rnams sgo phye zhes zer ro/ /des sgo ma phye ba dang / rgyal po ku co'i sgras sad nas smras pa/ bu mo/
116a2('dul ba): de ci zhig /des smras pa/ lha/ mi dag cig chab sgo phye zhes mchi zhing / lha'i mtshan kyang smos so/ /des smras pa/ bu mo/ sgo 'di sus bcad/ lha/ bdag gis bkum mo/ /ci'i phyir
116a3('dul ba): bcad/ lha/ bdag gi glo ba la rgyal po 'di dag la ni/ dgra mang bas/ gal te 'di mnal log pa la 'ga' zhig gis gnod pa bgyis na/ nges par bdag gi rje bo la grags pa ma
116a4('dul ba): lags par 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas de'i slad du bdag gis chab sgo bkum mo/ /des smras pa/ bu mo mdzangs ma mo khyod la nga'i the tshom 'di 'dri bar bya ste/ re zhig khyod ming chen gyi cir
116a5('dul ba): 'ong smros shig / des smras pa/ bdag de'i mngag gzhug bgyid pa'i bran mo lags so/ /khyod de'i mngag gzhug byed pa'i bran mo ma yin gyi/ khyod nges par de'i bu mo yin gyi/ khyod kyis
116a6('dul ba): drang por smros shig / de cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo/ khyod ming chen gyi gan du song la rgyal po gsal rgyal khyod kyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /zhes
116a7('dul ba): byos shig / de myur ba myur bar song ste/ jo bo/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal khyod kyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /zhes smras so/ /shAkya ming chen gyis thos nas bza' ba dang /
116b1('dul ba): btung ba dang / dri dang / phreng ba dag bshams nas skye bo phal po ches bskor te kun dga' ra bar song ngo / /de nas gcig la gcig byon pa legs so/ /zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kun tu spyad
116b2('dul ba): pas so so yang dag par dga' bar byas nas rgyal po khrus byas shing zan zos nas gtam dag byas te yud tsam zhig bsdad nas smras pa/ ming chen/ bu mo 'di khyod kyi cir 'ong / lha/ mngag
116b3('dul ba): gzhug bgyid pa'i bran mo lags so/ /'di khyod kyi mngag gzhug byed pa'i bran mo ma yin gyi/ 'di khyod kyi bu mo yin gyi/ nga la byin cig /des smras pa/ lha/ shAkya'i bu mo gzhan 'di bas ches
116b4('dul ba): khyad par du 'phags pa dag mchis na/ de dag bzhes su gsol/ 'di cir 'tshal rgyal pos smras pa/ 'di nyid nga la dgos kyi/ 'di nga la byin cig /des smras pa/ lha/ gal te de lta na tshul
116b5('dul ba): bzhin bgyis te dbul lo/ /de bzhin byos shig /de nas shAkya ming chen gyis grong khyer mdzes par byed du bcug ste/ bu mo de rgyan thams cad kyis klubs nas glang po che la bskyon te lam po che
116b6('dul ba): dang / srang dang / lam gyi sum mdo dang / bzhi mdo dag tu grong khyer ser skya'i gnas na 'khod pa dang / yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la/ shes ldan dag nyon cig /shAkya
116b7('dul ba): ming chen gyi bu mo phreng ldan ma/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi btsun mor phul lo/ /zhes dril bsgrags pa byas so/ /de nas de ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi btsun mor phul bar
117a1('dul ba): skye bo phal po che rnams kyis kyang shes so/ /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis dpal gyi 'byor ba chen pos blangs nas mnyan yod du khrid pa dang / de'i
117a2('dul ba): mas bdag gi bus bran mo chung mar blangs so/ /zhes thos te/ de kun nas dkris pa skyes nas bsam pa/ 'di ni/ nges par pha de'i bu ma yin pa'am/ bdag gi khong du don med pa zhig
117a3('dul ba): bsrel te/ 'di ltar bran mo'i khyor skyes par gyur to/ /snyam nas de yang sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa dang / rgyal pos kyang phreng ldan ma la smras pa/ phreng ldan ma/ song la sgyug mo'i
117a4('dul ba): zhabs la phyag byos shig / de song ste de'i rkang pa gnyis la bzung ba dang / de reg bya dang ldan pa yin pas/ des reg pa tsam gyis de gnyid log ste/ sad nas bsam pa/ bu zan ma'i bu
117a5('dul ba): mo 'di'i reg pa 'di 'dra bas/ ko sa la'i rigs 'di rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /snyam mo/ /de'i tshe ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la/ btsun mo dam pa/ rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma dang / phreng
117a6('dul ba): ldan ma gnyis yod de/ gang gi tshe rgyal po phreng ldan ma dang thabs cig bzhugs pa de'i tshe/ phreng ldan ma/ rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma ni/ 'di lta bur yang gzugs bzang ngo / /zhes dbyar
117a7('dul ba): tshul ma'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang / des smras pa/ lha/ de bdag gis nam zhig na mthong bar 'gyur lags/ rgyal pos smras pa/ ma rings shig dang / ring po mi thogs par mthong
117b1('dul ba): bar 'gyur ro/ /de re ba dang bcas pas 'dug go /gang gi tshe rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma dang thabs cig 'dug pa de'i tshe yang / dbyar tshul ma/ phreng ldan ma ni/ de lta bu'i reg bya dang yang ldan pa
117b2('dul ba): yin no/ /zhes phreng ldan ma'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang / des smras pa/ lha/ de bdag gis nam zhig na mthong bar 'gyur lags/ rgyal pos smras pa/ ma rings shig dang / ring po mi thogs
117b3('dul ba): par mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag rgyal pos ji lta ji ltar ya mtshan bskyed pa de ltar phan tshun mthong bar spro bar gyur to/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na so ga'i dus la bab ste/ nags tshal na shing
117b4('dul ba): rnams me tog rgyas par gyur cing / ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug dang / shang shang te'u sgra 'byin pa'i skyed mos tshal gyi gnas su rgyal po
117b5('dul ba): btsun mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing gshegs so/ /bud med ni/ me tog dang / 'bras bu la dga' ba yin pas/ skyed mos tshal de dang de dag tu 'khyams par brtsams pa dang /
117b6('dul ba): rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma ngal bas skyo zhing snyom par gyur nas shing mya ngan 'tshang la bsnyes te 'dug pa dang / ji tsam na phreng ldan mas mthong ngo / /de de'i gzugs bzang ba mthong bas/
117b7('dul ba): shing gi lha mo yin no/ /snyam du rig nas mod la rkang pa la phyag byas pa dang / phreng ldan ma'i lag pas reg ma thag pa nyid du gnyid log par gyur to/ /ji tsam na rgyal pos dbyar tshul ma la
118a1('dul ba): phreng ldan ma'i bsngags pa brjod par brtsams pa dang / des smras pa/ lha/ de bdag gis nam zhig na mthong bar 'gyur lags/ rgyal pos smras pa/ de
118a2('dul ba): khyod kyis mthong ngo / /lha/ bdag ma dran no/ /ngas khyod dran par bya'o/ /legs so/ /gang gi lag pa gnyis kyis khyod kyi rkang pa la bzung ba de dran nam/ lha/ de lha mo phreng ldan ma
118a3('dul ba): lags sam/ de yin no/ /lha/ gang khyod reg bya dang ldan pa'i btsun mo de lta bu spangs te bdag gi drung du gshegs pa de ni/ khyod bdag la nges par byams shing thugs gcugs
118a4('dul ba): pa lags so/ /de bzhin du phreng ldan ma la/ dbyar tshul ma ni/ 'di lta bu yin no/ /zhes bsngags pa brjod par brtsams pa dang / des smras pa/ lha/ bdag gis nam zhig na
118a5('dul ba): mthong bar 'gyur lags/ rgyal pos smras pa/ de khyod kyis mthong ngo / /lha/ bdag mi dran no/ /ngas khyod dran par bya'o/ /legs so/ /khyod kyis shing mya ngan 'tshang la bsnyes te 'dug
118a6('dul ba): pa gang la phyag byas pa de dran nam/ lha/ ci de dbyar tshul ma lags sam/ de yin no/ /lha/ gang khyod kyis btsun mo gzugs bzang ba de lta bu spangs te bdag gi drung du gshegs
118a7('dul ba): pa de ni/ khyod nges par bdag la byams shing thugs gcugs pa lags so/ /skabs der ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la btsun mo dam pa rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma dang / phreng
118b1('dul ba): ldan ma gnyis yod de/ de dag las gcig ni/ gzugs bzang ba rnams kyi mchog yin la/ gcig shos ni/ reg bya dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog yin no/ /zhes phyogs su sgra grags pa dang
118b2('dul ba): dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun mo phreng ldan ma dang / dbyar tshul mas las ci zhig bgyis na/
118b3('dul ba): las de'i rnam par smin pas/ gcig ni/ reg bya dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur la/ gcig shos ni/ gzugs bzang ba rnams kyi mchog tu gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
118b4('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de dag nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing
118b5('dul ba): bsags pas/ de dag nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa dag ni/ sa'i khams la rnam
118b6('dul ba): par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la ma yin/ me'i khams la ma yin/ rlung gi khams la ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni/ zin pa'i
118b7('dul ba): phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ bskal pa brgya phrag rnams su yang / /las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur te/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /lus
119a1('dul ba): can rnams la 'bras bur smin/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na ri brag cig na bram ze zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma
119a2('dul ba): blangs te de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed de/ de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod pas bu khye'u zhig btsas so/ /yang rtse
119a3('dul ba): bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/ bu mo zhig btsas te/ de dag bsrings shing bskyed nas chen por gyur to/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ bram ze de
119a4('dul ba): chung ma dang bcas te shi nas bram ze'i khye'u de pha ma dang bral bas dben pa la dga' bar gyur te/ des sring mo de khrid de/ dgon pa'i gnas su song nas 'khod de/ der de dag rtsa ba
119a5('dul ba): dang / sdong bu dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dag gis 'tsho bar brtsams so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /sbrul nag po la ni/ nyes dmigs rnam pa
119a6('dul ba): lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ khro ba dang / 'khon du 'dzin pa dang / 'khu ba dang / byas pa mi gzo ba dang / dug rno ba'o/ /de bzhin du bud med kha cig la yang nyes dmigs rnam pa
119a7('dul ba): lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ khro ba dang / 'khon du 'dzin pa dang / 'khu ba dang / byas pa mi gzo ba dang / dug rno ba'o/ /dge slong dag /de la bud med kyi dug rno ba ni/ 'di yin te/
119b1('dul ba): 'di ltar bud med ni/ phal cher 'dod chags lhag par che ba'o/ /de'i sring mo de nyon mongs pa dag gis gdungs nas/ des smras pa ming po/ bdag dgon pa'i rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / me
119b2('dul ba): tog dang / 'bras bus 'tsho ba'i rngo mi thogs kyi/ grong mthar bzhud do/ /des de khrid de grong mthar song ste/ de bram ze zhig gi der slong mo la zhugs so/ /des sring mo dang lhan cig slong mo'i
119b3('dul ba): phyir gcig car sgra phyung ba/ bram ze des thos te phyir byung nas smras pa/ drang srong dag kyang chung ma dang bcas te rgyu'am/ des smras pa/ 'di bdag gi chung ma ma yin gyi/ sring mo'o/ /'di su la byin/
119b4('dul ba): su la yang ma byin no/ /gal te de lta na/ kho bo la ci'i phyir mi sbyin/ 'di ni/ dam pa ma yin pa sdig pa'i chos de spangs pa yin no/ /de 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis gdungs pas smras pa/ ming
119b5('dul ba): po/ ci/ bdag dgon pa'i rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bus 'tsho bar rngo mi thogs pa med snyam mam/ bdag gis ni/ nyon mongs pa spang rngo ma thogs pa'i
119b6('dul ba): slad du khyod la de skad bgyis kyi/ bdag bram ze 'di la stsol cig /des smras pa/ de ni/ chos dang 'gal bas ngas khyod sbyin par mi bya'i/ khyod nyid shes par zad do/ /bram ze des de dang de'i
119b7('dul ba): bsam pa shes nas 'byor ba'i dpal chen pos de bag mar blangs te rang gi khyim du bcug go / de nas des ming po de la smras pa/ ming po tshur spyon/ khyod kyis kha ba dbub par mdzod cig dang
120a1('dul ba): thabs cig bzhugs so/ /des smras pa/ sring mo/ kho bo ni/ 'dod pa don du mi gnyer te/ khyod kyis gnang na/ rab tu 'byung ngo / /des smras pa/ dam zhig bca'
120a2('dul ba): ste/ gal te khyod skabs skabs su bdag gzigs shing byon na/ gnang bar bgyi'o/ /des smras pa/ legs te/ de bzhin bya'o/ /de des gnang nas drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ngo / /
120a3('dul ba): de dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin pas des slob dpon med par byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon du byas te/ rang byang chub mngon sum du byas nas des bsam pa/
120a4('dul ba): bdag gis sring mo de la 'ong ngo / /zhes dam bcas pas/ de'i phyir de'i gan du 'gro bar bya'o/ /snyam nas de de'i gan du song ngo / /song nas 'bar ba dang / gsal ba dang / char 'bab pa
120a5('dul ba): dang / glog 'byung ba'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams pa dang / so so'i skye bo dag ni/ rdzu 'phrul la myur du dad pa yin pas/ de shing drungs nas bcad pa bzhin du rkang pa la phyag 'tshal
120a6('dul ba): te smras pa/ ming po/ khyod kyis yon tan gyi khyad par 'di lta bu thob bam/ thob bo/ gal te de lta na/ khyod ni/ bsod snyoms don du gnyer ba lags/ bdag kyang bsod nams don du
120a7('dul ba): gnyer ba lags pas/ de'i slad du 'di nyid du bzhugs shig dang / khyod la bdag gis bsod snyoms dbul bar bgyi'o/ /des smras pa/ sring mo/ khyod ni gzhan la rag las pa yin
120b1('dul ba): gyi/ khyim thab la je dris shig /legs te/ de bzhin bgyi'o/ /des khyim thab la smras pa/ rje'i sras/ bdag gi ming po rab tu byung ba/ brtul zhugs grub pa/ bdag nyid chen por gyur te/
120b2('dul ba): gal te khyod kyis gnang na/ bdag gis zla ba gsum du bsod snyoms la spyan drang ngo / /des smras pa/ bzang mo/ gal te 'di rab tu byung bar ma gyur na/ bdag cag gis mi 'dod bzhin
120b3('dul ba): gso dgos par 'gyur na/ de rab tu byung ste brtul zhugs grub pa/ bdag nyid chen por gyur na lta smos kyang ci dgos/ song la spyan drongs shig /des de zla ba gsum du bsod snyoms la spyan
