378b6('dul ba): gang yin pa de ni/ phug la tha gus gdags par bya'o/ /chu tshags gzhan dag chu ma phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag gi glor yang dang yang du brdab par bya'o/ /
378b7('dul ba): dge slong dag chu rtog pa na bum pa ma gang ba la brtags pas srog chags dag ma rtogs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bum pa legs par bkang la ji srid du chu mi g.yo
379a1('dul ba): ba de srid du gzhag par bya zhing / de nas brtag par bya'o/ /bum pa bkang ba dang steng du rdul zhugs pa/ dge slong dag gis de ma bsal bas/ srog chags dag
379a2('dul ba): ma rtogs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdul bsal nas brtag par bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis srog chags mdzub mo'i rtse mos bstan pas de dag 'gul nas mig gis
379a3('dul ba): ma sod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shing bu'i rtse mo'am/ rtswa'i rtse mo'am/ phra mo gzhan gang yang rung bas bstan par bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis chu tshags nyid
379a4('dul ba): nas chu khron par pho ba dang / srog chags dag brdab bsnun pas gnod par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bsal tshags bsrel bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis
379a5('dul ba): bkang ste btang na/ phyir gang bzhin du 'ong pa gang yin pa de lta bu bsrel nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bkang ste btang na/ phyir stong bar 'ong ba ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba bsrel
379a6('dul ba): bar bya'o/ /gzhan dag cig gis bsal tshags ma 'byor nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag gis ni/ chu tshags tha gus btags la ci nus bkang ste/ btang na phyir
379a7('dul ba): stong par 'ong ba de lta btang bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis chu pho nas chu tshags bshal bar mi byed/ 'khru bar mi byed/ 'tshir bar mi byed/ skem par mi byed/ ltob par mi byed nas bcom
379b1('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chu tshags kyi chu pho nas de bshal bar bya/ bkru bar bya/ btsir bar bya/ bskam par bya/ bltab par bya'o/ /dge slong dag dge 'dun gyi chu yang chu tshags kyis
379b2('dul ba): 'tshag par byed pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun phal ches pas skyo bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te dge slong gi dge 'dun phal che bar gyur na/ chu tshags mang
379b3('dul ba): po bcang ba'am/ yang na bum tshags gce'u can bcang bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bum tshags gce'u can gyis btsag par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gis
379b4('dul ba): bum tshags gce'u can ji lta bu mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sa'am/ zangs las bum pa'i dbyibs lta bu bya zhing de la pad+ma'i snying po lta bu'i bu ga dag gdod par
379b5('dul ba): bya'o/ /de dag bsdu ba'i phyir de dag gi steng du bu ga chen po gcig gdod do/ /de dag nyid bsdu ba'i phyir 'og tu gce'u gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas steng ras kyis g.yogs la chu btsag
379b6('dul ba): par bya zhing / ras de yang bshal bar bya/ bkru bar bya/ bskam par bya'o// //'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/ bam po nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa/ dge slong dag gis shig
379b7('dul ba): dang / rtswa shig dang / srog chags gzhan dag g.yang sa nas bor ba dang / de dag dran pa nyams shing gnod par gyur to/ /skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol
380a1('dul ba): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ srog chags thams cad g.yang sa nas dor bar mi bya'o/ /de dag gis gar bab bab tu bor ba dang / bcom ldan
380a2('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gar bab bab tu dor bar mi bya'i/ shig ni/ ras ma'i nang du gzhug par bya/ de ma rnyed na/ ka ba'i ser ka'am/ rtsig pa'i bu gar chug cig /rtswa shig ni/
380a3('dul ba): ne'u gsing sngon po'i sa phyogs su gzhag par bya'o/ /de ma rnyed na/ bsil ba'i phyogs su'o/ /srog chags gzhan yang rang rang gi gnas su gtang bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
380a4('dul ba): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ chab btsags pa ma brtags pa 'tshal du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor/ mig gis ma brtags na/ mi rung ngo / /btsun
380a5('dul ba): pa| chab btsags pa brtags pa 'tshal du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor/ mig gis brtags pa'i phyir rung ngo / /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyar gnas
380a6('dul ba): par khas blangs pa'i dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang gding ba bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis thos nas des dge 'dun la sra brkyang phul lo/ /de
380a7('dul ba): bzhin du btsun mo phreng ldan ma dang / rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang / drang srong byin dang / rnying pa dag dang / phya mkhan dag dang / gzhan mang
380b1('dul ba): po dag gis sra brkyang phul pa dang / dge slong dag gis sra brkyang gcig cig byin gyis brlabs nas lhag ma gzhan de dag nyid la slar bskur bar brtsams pa dang / de dag gis 'phags pa/ 'di
380b2('dul ba): dag ni/ bdag cag gis dge 'dun la phul ba lags pas/ bdag cag slar ji ltar 'tshal/ skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
380b3('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir gnang gi /blang bar bya zhing / blangs nas kyang gtan pa gding pa'i dge slong mang po bsko bar bya'o/ /ji ltar sngar bskos pa de las phyis gcig gding bar bya'o/ /lhag
380b4('dul ba): ma rnams ni/ gzhag par bya zhing / de ni/ dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa'i dge 'dun gyi bgo ba'i rnyed pa yin pas/ dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa'i dge 'dun tshogs pas ci dgar bgo bar
380b5('dul ba): bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /sdom ni/ nga 'das pa la sbyin med dang / /gang gis bsngos pa shi ba dang / gang la gtad pa shi ba dang / /babs pa dang ni 'gyod pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom
380b6('dul ba): ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs
380b7('dul ba): te| de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las rim gyis bu gsum byung ngo / /
381a1('dul ba): de rnams kyis tha chung gang yin pa de/ legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ngo / /de dus gzhan zhig na ljongs rgyu zhing song ngo / /de dus gzhan zhig na ljongs rgyu zhing song ngo / /ljongs rgyu zhing
381a2('dul ba): song ba na de'i pha nad kyis thebs nas de rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu'i sman rnams kyis rim gro byas kyang de'i nad de zhi bar ma gyur te/ gang gi tshe de la shi la
381a3('dul ba): thug pa'i tshor ba byung ste ring por mi thogs par 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ des mdza' bo dang / gnyen dang / phu nu bo dang / khyim tshes rnams bsdus nas bu de gnyis la
381a4('dul ba): smras pa/ bu/ nga'i khyim na cung zad ci yod pa de thams cad khyer te shog cig /de dag gis kyang de'i tshig mnyan te thams cad khyer te 'ongs pa dang / des mdza' bo dang / gnyen dang /
381a5('dul ba): phu nu de dag dang / khyim tshes kyi mi de la smras pa/ shes ldan dag gson cig/ bdag gi bu gsum yod pa las/ phu bo gnyis ni/ 'di dag yin/ tha chung gang yin pa de ni/ dge sbyong shAkya'i
381a6('dul ba): bu'i nang du rab tu byung ngo / /de'i phyir bdag gi khyim na nor gang cung zad ci yod pa de thams cad de rnams mnyam par bgos shig/ ces smras nas/ bsags pa kun gyi mtha' 'dzad
381a7('dul ba): cing / /mthon po'i mtha' ni bsnyil bar 'gyur/ /'du ba'i mtha' ni 'bral ba ste/ /gson po'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin/ /zhes bya bas dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur te/ de khyogs gos sngon
381b1('dul ba): po dang / dmar po dang / ser po dang / dkar po dag gis brgyan te dur khrod du khyer nas bsregs so/ /de'i bu de dag gis de'i shid btang ba dang / mya ngan bsang ba byas te 'dug go/ de'i bu des
381b2('dul ba): bdag gi pha de shi'o zhes thos nas de 'di snyam du/ bdag song la ma yar mo de dang / phu bo de dag la chos bshad de mya ngan bsang bar bya'o/ /snyam du bsam nas de ji srid 'dod par ljongs na
381b3('dul ba): 'dug nas lhung bzed dang chos gos khyer te mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing song nas rim gyis rgyu zhing song ba las mnyan yod du phyin to/ des chos gos dang lhung bzed rgyal byed kyi tshal
381b4('dul ba): du bzhag ste lam gyis dub pa ngal bsos nas rang gi khyim du song ngo / /nang mi rnams kyis de mthong nas dus so/ /ngu ba de thos nas khyim tshes rnams 'dus te la la ni/ skad phyung ste ngu / la

381b6('dul ba): bud med cig gis smras pa/ bu/ mya ngan ma byed cig/ khyod kyi pha de bsod nams byas pas lha yul du song ngo / /khyod la yang phas mdza' bo dang / gnyen dang / phu nu bo dang / khyim tshes rnams
381b7('dul ba): bsdus te nor gyi sum cha gcig kyang byin no/ /des bsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nga 'das nas 'di la byin cig/ ces zer ba ni/ med pa yin no/ /zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'di lta
382a1('dul ba): bu yin no/ /snyam du rig nas nga de'i phyir mya ngan byed pa ni/ ma yin gyi/ nga'i pha de dka' ba byed byed pas dbang med par mchi ma byung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das
382a2('dul ba): kyis kyang pha ma ni/ bu la dka' ba byed de/ snyod pa dang / gso ba dang / skyed pa dang / 'dzam bu gling sna tshogs ston pa yin te/ bu'i phrag pa gcig gis pha blangs shing / gcig shos kyis
382a3('dul ba): ma blangs te lo brgya tshang bar bkur bar byas pa dang / sa chen po 'di la nor bu dang / mu tig dang / baiDUR+Ya dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / dngul dang / gser dang / rdo'i snying po dang / spug
382a4('dul ba): dang / pad+ma rA ga dang / g.yas su 'khyil ba de lta bu'i dbang phyug gi bdag por bzhag kyang 'di tsam gyis/ bus pha dang ma la phan thogs pa dang / lan lon par mi 'gyur gyi/ gang zhig

382b1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis nga 'das nas de la byin cig ces zer ba ni/ sbyin pa yang ma yin no/ /zhes bkag go /bud med de cang mi zer bar 'dug go/ skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom

382b4('dul ba): pa ni/ byin pa yin gyi/ rab tu byung ba ni/ ma yin pas blang bar bya zhing / blangs nas kyang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin longs spyod du yongs su spyad par bya'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /dge slong
382b5('dul ba): zhig gis/ dge slong zhig la chos gos dag bsngos so/ /des de dag bsngos nas dus las 'das pa dang / dge slong de dag gis de khyer nas bsreg tu song ngo / /de'i bar du dge slong des de'i
382b6('dul ba): gnas khang nas de'i chos gos de dag blangs te rang gi gnas khang du bzhag go/ de nas dge slong de dag gis de'i rim gro byas nas gtsug lag khang du log pa dang / dge bskos kyis de'i

383a3('dul ba): shig/ des de la dris pa dang / smras pa/ bdag gis khyer te/ des bdag la bsngos so/ /skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis

383a6('dul ba): bsngos pa de dus las 'das so/ /dge slong rnams kyis ngur khrod du khyer nas bsregs te slar 'ongs nas de'i chos gos de dag rgan pa'i mthar khyer ba dang / de la dge slong gis smras
383a7('dul ba): pa| tshe dang ldan pa/ 'di dag su'i yin/ des smras pa/ 'di dag ni/ bdag gi lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang bdag gis de la bsngos so/ /dge slong dag gis de ji ltar bsgrub pa mi
383b1('dul ba): shes nas skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ rung bar bya ba'i phyir ngas bsngo bar gnang mod
383b2('dul ba): kyi| 'on kyang gang gis bsngos pa de nyid kyi yin no/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /dge slong gzhan zhig gis dge slong zhig la chos gos dag bsngos pa dang / gang la bsngos pa de babs

383b5('dul ba): de| dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong gang kho na la yid brtan te
383b6('dul ba): chos gos dag gtams pa de kho na'i mdun du bsngo ba las gyur gyi/ de'i phyir dge slong gis gang la yid brtan te chos gos dag gtams pa de kho na'i mdun du bsngo bar mi bya'o/ /snyam du
383b7('dul ba): dgongs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis yid brtan zhing chos gos gtams pa de nyid kyi mdun du chos gos bsngo bar mi bya'i/ de'i
384a1('dul ba): mngon sum du bsngo ba ma byas na/ des na/ nyes dmigs der mi 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /dge slong gzhan zhig gis dge slong zhig la chos
384a2('dul ba): gos dag bsngos te gang la bsngos pa de 'thab krol can zhig ste/ rtag tu dge slong dang lhan cig 'thab krol byed pa las/ de gzhan zhig dang 'thab mo byas nas 'gro bar chas pa dang /

384a6('dul ba): stsal pa/ gal te yid brtan pa'i dge slong rgya mtsho'i pha rol na 'dug pa zhig yin na/ de la yid brtan te bsngo ba byas nas gzung bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan

384b2('dul ba): thos pa dang / dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes so/ /skabs de/ dge slong dag la smras pa dang / dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gi tshe
384b3('dul ba): thos pa de'i tshe gzhan la bsngo bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /sdom ni/ mtshams kyi phyi rol 'dug pa yis/ /dad pa mi dbul sbyin mi bya/ /gcig la gcig ni mi bya dang / /

384b6('dul ba): gnas pas dad pa dbul bar mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshams kyi phyi rol na gnas pas dad pa dbul bar mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong gzhan dag cig mtshams
384b7('dul ba): kyi phyi rol tu song ngo / /de dag chas pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bya ba zhig byung nas drug sde rnams kyis de dag las dad pa blangs so/ /skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol
385a1('dul ba): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song ba las dad pa blang bar mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshams kyi phyi rol na

385a3('dul ba): gcig la gcig dad pa sbyin par byed de/ dga' bos ni/ nye dga' la/ nye dgas kyang dga' bo la/ 'dun pas ni/ 'char ka la/ 'char kas kyang 'dun pa la/ 'gro mgyogs kyis ni/ nab

385a6('dul ba): thar pa'i mdo gdon pa thon cig/ ces bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde dag mtshams kyi phyi rol na gnas shing gso sbyong la 'dun pa dang / yongs su dag pa 'bul lo/ /skabs de/ dge
385a7('dul ba): slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshams kyi phyi rol na gnas pas gso sbyong la 'dun pa dang / yongs su dag pa dbul
385b1('dul ba): bar mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshams kyi phyi rol na gnas pas gso sbyong la 'dun pa dang / yongs su dag pa dbul bar mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong gzhan dag cig

386a1('dul ba): gcig gso sbyong gi dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa sbyin na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyar gnas

386a3('dul ba): dgag dbye'i dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa 'bul ba rgyas par thams cad gso sbyong bzhin no/ /sdom ni/ dge slong bgrang bar bya ba dang / tshul shing dag dang gang 'dod dang / /stan gcig
386a4('dul ba): khyim na gnas pa dang / /dge tshul gsar bu mi 'dug pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs
386a5('dul ba): so/ /mnyan yod na bram ze zhig 'dug pa de bya ba cung zad cig la phyir byung nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang / de re zhig 'di na dge slong du zhig gnas dri'o/ /snyam pa'i 'dod pa skyes
386a6('dul ba): nas des dge slong rnams la dris pa/ 'phags pa dag /'di na dge slong du zhig gnas/ de dag gis smras pa/ bram ze/ ma shes so/ /bram zes smras pa/ yul ko sa la'i rgyal po
386a7('dul ba): gsal rgyal gyi khrom gyi ru'i grangs kyang shes na/ khyed kyis dge slong dag mi shes pa lta/ de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang / bram ze de song ngo / /skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis
386b1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bgrang bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag bgrang bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal
386b2('dul ba): pa dang / dge slong dag gis gcig ces bya ba la sogs pas bgrangs pa dang / phyis brjed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gcig ces bya ba la sogs pas bgrang bar mi bya'o/
386b3('dul ba): dge slong dag gis sor mos 'dzugs shing bgrang na/ 'on kyang brjed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sor mos gzugs shing bgrang bar mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong
386b4('dul ba): dag gcig ces bya ba la sogs pas bgrang bar mi bya/ sor mos btsugs shing bgrang bar mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gis ji ltar bgrang ba ma shes so/ /skabs de/
386b5('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshul shing brim par bya zhing brims nas bgrang bar bya/ bgrangs nas dge 'dun la dge
386b6('dul ba): slong 'di snyed do/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshul shing brim par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gis nyi ma'am/ zla ba'am/ lo gang la brim pa mi
386b7('dul ba): shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbyar nye bar gtod pa'i tshe tshul shing brim par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag bgrang bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa
387a1('dul ba): dang / mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig gnas pa de dus dus su rgyal byed kyi tshal du nye bar 'ongs te/ des de na dge slong dag/ bsam gtan dang / 'don pa dang /
387a2('dul ba): yid la byed pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa mthong nas de dag gi spyod lam dang / spyod pa dang / sgrub pa des mngon par dad de/ des bsam pa/ re zhig 'di na dge slong ji snyed cig yod pa
387a3('dul ba): dris la phyis spyan drangs te bshos gsol lo/ /snyam nas des dge slong rnams la dris pa/ 'phags pa/ dge slong ji snyed cig bzhugs/ dge slong dag gis smras pa/ 'di snyed cig go/
387a4('dul ba): des rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te song nas rang gi khyim du phyin te nang mi la smras pa/ sang kho bos sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol gyi/ khyed kyis dge slong 'di
387a5('dul ba): snyed cig gi bshos sbyor cig / de dag gis smras pa/ rje'i sras/ legs te/ de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /zhes de dag gis hwags dang / bu ram dang / sha kha ra la sogs pa sta gon bya bar
387a6('dul ba): brtsams so/ khyim bdag de yang mdza' bo dang / nye du dang / phu nu rnams sbran nas bshams zin pa'i dus su de dag dang lhan cig rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste rgan pa'i mtha' nas
387a7('dul ba): rkang pa la phyag byas nas dge bskos la smras pa/ 'phags pa/ khyim bdag che ge mo zhig /sang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun sdum par gdugs tshod la spyan 'dren
387b1('dul ba): to/ /zhes de skad gsungs shig /dge bskos kyis smras pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis gnang nas de rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te song ngo / /dge slong gzhan dag cig kyang ljongs rgyu ba
387b2('dul ba): rgyu zhing mnyan yod du phyin to/ /de nas khyim bdag de de nyid kyi nub mo bza' ba dang / bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa sta gon byas nas nang par sngar langs te gdan bshams/ chu ra bzhag
387b3('dul ba): nas bcom ldan 'das la pho nya bas/ btsun pa/ gdugs tshod bshams lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol zhes gdugs tshod gdas par gsol
387b4('dul ba): to/ /dge slong rnams snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te khyim bdag de'i khyim du dong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das ni/ gtsug lag khang na bzhugs shing gdugs
387b5('dul ba): tshod der drangs so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ rgyu lngas gtsug lag khang na bzhugs shing gdugs tshod 'dren te/ lnga gang zhe na/ nang du yang dag 'jog par bzhed pa yin/
387b6('dul ba): lha rnams la chos ston par bzhed pa yin/ gnas mal la gzigs par bzhed pa yin/ nad pa la gzigs par bzhed pa yin/ nyan thos rnams 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed

388a1('dul ba): bdag des dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi tshad bzhin stan bshams/ zan sta gon byas pa las/ ji tsam na/ dge slong rab tu mang bar mthong nas des smras pa/ 'phags
388a2('dul ba): pa/ bdag gis khyed kyis dge slong ji snyed yod pa bstan pa de snyed kyi dge slong gi gdan bshams/ bshos sta gon byas na/ dge slong mang du byon to/ /dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim
388a3('dul ba): bdag / dge slong glo bur ba dag lhags kyi/ rab tu dga' ba skyed cig /des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ kye ma khyed kyis dge slong gzhan dag kyang 'ongs so/ /zhes bgyis pa dang / bdag gis

388b6('dul ba): chos bstan par brtsams so/ /des de la chos ston pa na/ ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma sa ga dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi na ba'i sman khyer nas glu dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / rgyal byed kyi tshal du chas

393a6('dul ba): rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang / stag dri snom zhing phyi bzhin 'brangs nas rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na sgra 'byin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mkhyen bzhin
393a7('dul ba): du rmed par mdzad pa yin pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la smras pa/ stag 'o ni ci ste skad 'byin/ des gsol ba/ btsun pa/ des god ma sbas pa de/ btsun
393b1('dul ba): pa nye dgas 'tshal te mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ dge slong dag stag gi god ma za'am/ btsun pa/ 'tshal lags so/ /kun dga'
393b2('dul ba): bo| ri dwags kyi rgyal po seng ge ni/ ri dwags bzang po bzang po dag bsad nas sha bzang po dag zos shing khrag bzang po dag 'thungs nas bor te 'gro'i/ stag god ma sbed par byed pas/
393b3('dul ba): de lta bas na/ dge slong gis stag gi god ma bza' bar mi bya ste/ za na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /gzhan yang ngas dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi kun tu spyad pa'i
393b4('dul ba): chos bca' bar bya ste/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi dge slong gis sha 'brim pa'i tshe/ 'di ci'i sha/ stag gi god ma ma yin nam zhes dri bar bya'o/ /ma dris par len na/ 'gal tshabs
393b5('dul ba): can du 'gyur ro/ /sdom ni/ tshul shing rnams ni brims pa na/ spun gnyis dag ni gab pa dang / la ba bsgyur bar bya ba dang / /de lta bu la sogs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
393b6('dul ba): mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /ri bor zhig na gtsug lag khang zhig yod de/ ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na dga' bo dang nye
393b7('dul ba): dga' ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba las ri bor der phyin to/ /de dag der phyin pa na/ dge 'dun la yang rnyed pa zhig grub na de dag gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa yin pas dge slong gang gis kyang
394a1('dul ba): ma bcar ba dang nye dga' bos dga' bo la smras pa/ slob dpon/ lhung bzed nag po can 'di dag /khengs pa nga rgyal can dag cig pas gtse'i/ chur spyon/
394a2('dul ba): gab ste bzhugs la 'di dag rnyed pa ji ltar bged pa gzigs so/ /des smras pa/ legs te/ de bzhin bya'o/ /zhes de dag gab ste 'dug pa dang / dge 'dun gyis rnyed pa de bgos so/ /
394a3('dul ba): gang gi tshe rnyed pa de bgos zin pa de'i tshe de dag 'ongs nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa grub pa bgo'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ khyed ga las da gzod 'dir
394a4('dul ba): 'ongs kyi/ rnyed pa de 'brim pa'i tshe ma yin/ de dag gis smras pa/ ci/ khyed bgod rgyu zhig yin nam/ bgos par mi chud kyi/ bgo nyes te/ ci/ khyod kyis go bar byas nas bgos sam/
394a5('dul ba): skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun la deng dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa 'brim na/ dge slong gang yang
394a6('dul ba): gang du yang ma 'gro zhig / ces go bar byas nas rnyed pa brim par bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis rnyed pa de slar bsdus so/ /bsdus nas dge 'dun la dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa 'brim na/ dge
394a7('dul ba): slong gang yang gang du yang ma 'gro zhig / ces bsgos nas de dag gis bgo bar brtsams pa dang / dga' bo dang nye dga' de bzhin du gab ste 'dug go/ //'dul ba
394b1('dul ba): phran tshegs kyi gzhi/ bam po nyi shu rtsa gsum pa/ gang gi tshe dge 'dun gyis rnyed pa de bgos zin pa de'i tshe de dag yang 'ongs nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /tshur/ rnyed pa de bgo'o/ /dge
394b2('dul ba): slong dag gis smras pa/ khyed gang nas da gzod 'dir 'ongs kyi/ rnyed pa de dge 'dun la go bar byas nas 'brim pa'i tshe ni ma yin/ de dag gis smras pa/ gal te khyod kyis go bar byas kyang bgos
394b3('dul ba): par mi tshud kyi/ bgo nyes te/ ci/ khyed kyis go bar byas nas gaN+DI brdungs sam/ skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
394b4('dul ba): pa| go bar byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dge 'dun la rnyed pa de brim par bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis yang rnyed pa de slar bsdus so/ /bsdus nas de bzhin du go bar byas te gaN+DI brdungs nas bgo
394b5('dul ba): bar brtsams pa dang / de dag de kho na bzhin du gab ste 'dug go/ gang gi tshe rnyed pa de bgos zin pa de'i tshe yang 'ongs te de kho na bzhin du smras pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ dge
394b6('dul ba): 'dun la yang go bar byas/ gaN+DI yang brdungs nas khyed ga las da gzod 'dir 'ongs/ de dag gis smras pa/ khyed kyis go bar yang byas/ gaN+DI de yang brdungs kyang cig /khyed kyis tshul shing
394b7('dul ba): brims sam/ bgos par mi tshud kyi/ bgo nyes so/ /zhes zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ go bar byas
395a1('dul ba): te gaN+DI brdungs nas tshul shing brim par bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis yang rnyed pa de bsdus so/ /bsdus nas go bar byas/ gaN+DI brdungs tshul shing brims te
395a2('dul ba): bgo bar brtsams pa dang / de dag de kho na bzhin du gab ste 'dug go /gang gi tshe rnyed pa de bgos zin pa de'i tshe de dag 'ongs nas de kho na bzhin du smras pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis
395a3('dul ba): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ khyed kyis dge 'dun la de ltar co 'dri'am/ dge 'dun la go bar byas/ gaN+DI brdungs/ tshul shing brims na/ khyed ga las da gzod 'dir phyin/ de dag gis
395a4('dul ba): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /rnyed pa lta bar shog /gal te de lta na/ kho bo cag gis dge 'dun ji ltar co dris pa smros shig /gal te khyed kyis dge 'dun la go bar byas/ gaN+DI
395a5('dul ba): brdungs/ tshul shing brims na/ de ci/ khyed kyis kho bo cag gi bgo skal bstan tam/ der zad/ rnyed pa med kyang bla/ 'gro'o/ /zhes zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom
395a6('dul ba): ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun la go bar byas/ gaN+DI brdungs/ tshul shing brims nas gang zhig mi snang ba de'i bgo skal bstan
395a7('dul ba): nas bgo bar bya'o/ /bgos zin te 'ong ba gang yin pa de la ni/ rnyed pa sbyin par mi bya ste/ gal te de ltar bgos na/ legs par bgos pa yin pas/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /
395b1('dul ba): dge slong gis ched du bsam ste de ltar dge 'dun la co 'dri bar yang mi bya'o/ /dge slong ched du bsam ste dge 'dun la co 'dri bar byed na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan
395b2('dul ba): yod na'o/ /gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis rgyal byed kyi tshal phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul nas tshon rtsi'i khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs kyis phyi nang bcas te ri mo bris
395b3('dul ba): p a de'i tshe mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis ji ltar khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis rgyal byed kyi tshal tshon rtsi'i khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs kyis phyi nang bcas te ri mo bris nas mchog
395b4('dul ba): tu phun sum tshogs par byas pa thos te/ de'i tshe srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma rgyal byed kyi tshal blta ba'i phyir nye bar song ngo / /yang de'i tshe mnyan yod na bram ze zhig gnas pa de la rgyal po
395b5('dul ba): dang / blon po dang / grong mi rnams bram ze 'di mdzes so/ /zhes mngon par dad de/ des rgyal po'i pho brang nas chen po la 'os pa'i la ba zhig thob bo/ /des de bgos nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du ltad
395b6('dul ba): mo bltar song ba dang / de mthong ma thag kho nar dad pa chen po skyes nas des la ba de phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gos kyi rnyed pa byung na/ tha na
395b7('dul ba): me mar gyi snying po'i rgyu tsam du yang mnyam par bgo'o/ /zhes gsungs pas/ dge slong rnams kyis de tshal bu tshal bur byas nas mnyam par bgos so/ /bram ze des bsam pa/ la ba de
396a1('dul ba): chen po la 'os pa zhig pas/ bdag gis 'phags pa rnams la kaR+sha pa Na dag phul la slar blang ngo / /snyam ste/ de nang par sngar langs nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du
396a2('dul ba): song ba dang / rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na dge slong mang po gcig 'dug go /des smras pa/ 'phags pa dag/ phyag 'tshal lo/ /bram ze chen po/ nad med cig/ 'phags pa/ bdag
396a3('dul ba): gis khyed la la ba phul ba de/ khyed kyis cir bgyis/ dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ bram ze chen po/ rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig /kho bo cag gis mnyam par bgos so/ /gcig
396a4('dul ba): cig gis smras pa/ bdag gis ni/ bgo skal zhwa la glan to/ /gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ bdag gis ni/ lham yu thung la glan to/ /gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ bdag gis ni/ stod
396a5('dul ba): kor la glan to/ /gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ bdag gis lhung bzed phyi bar byas so/ /des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ la ba chen po la 'os pa zhig na/ kye ma khyed kyis de kaR+sha pa Na dag
396a6('dul ba): tu bsgyur la kaR+sha pa Na dag bgo 'dod ces zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/

396b1('dul ba): yin lnga dag gi / lham ni dgag pa mdzad pa dang / /dom lpags kyi ni lham dag dang / /de yi steng gi rim pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon
396b2('dul ba): med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga' bo/ bdag cag gis mnyan yod du skye bo mang po thams cad la ma lus par bza' ba'i rin
396b3('dul ba): bslangs na/ rgyal po'i glang po che 'dul ba de dag gis bdag cag la cung zad kyang ma byin gyi/ tshur shog /'dong ngo / /cung zad cig bslang ngo / /de na kha cig gis smras pa/ legs te/ de ltar
396b4('dul ba): bya mod kyi/ 'on kyang thabs shig bsham par bya'o/ /ci zhig bya/ seng ge'i pags pa las lham byas la de bgos te rdzi kar 'dug nas glang po che rnams dkrog par bya'o/ /gzhan dag gis smras
396b5('dul ba): pa| re zhig de bzhin du bslangs la/ gal te ma ster na/ phyis de ltar bya'o/ /zhes de rnams nang par sngar langs te de dag gi drung du song nas smras pa/ bzhin bzang dag /gtum po khyed kyis kho
396b6('dul ba): po cag la zas kyi rin mi sbyin nam/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ khyed la kho bo cag ci rag lus na/ gang gi phyir kho bo cag gis zas kyi rin sbyin/ drug sde rnams kyis 'jal to/ /zhes
396b7('dul ba): byas nas song ngo / /de dag gis sngar gros byas pa bzhin seng ge'i pags pa las lham byas nas bgos te/ de dag glang po che rnams rgyu ba'i rdzi kar dong ste 'dug pa dang / glang po che rnams kyis
397a1('dul ba): seng ge'i dri tshor te bred nas gcin rtug gtor te 'bros par brtsams so/ /glang po che 'dul ba rnams kyis lcags kyu dag gis zho sha yod med kyis gzung na/ ma
397a2('dul ba): thub pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /ma gtang zhig/ ma gtang zhig/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ mi thub na/ ji ltar mi gtang / drug sde rnams kyis smras
397a3('dul ba): pa| kho bo cag gis glan nam/ 'phags pa/ de ltar gnang na/ sman che'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag /gal te bza' ba'i rin ster bar dam 'cha' na/ glan no/ /'phags pa/ dbul lo/ /bden
397a4('dul ba): grang zhes byas nas de dag rdzi phyogs ma yin par dong ste 'dug pa dang / seng+ge'i dri ma mnam pas glang po che rnams sdod do/ /glang po che 'dul ba rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ ci/ khyed
397a5('dul ba): rig sngags mkhyen tam/ bzhin bzang / kho bo cag rig sngags mi shes so/ /'phags pa/ gal te de lta na/ khyed kyis ji ltar bzlog/ de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad pa dang / de
397a6('dul ba): dag gis smras pa/ khyod kyis gnod pa 'di lta bu yang byas pa lta/ gal te rgyal po'i glang po che dam pa/ yan lag mchog can 'di lta bu dag nags kyi nang du shor bar gyur na/ khyed kyis
397a7('dul ba): rgyal po la rku byas par ma gyur tam/ de dag 'dzum dmul nas cang mi zer bar 'dug pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
397b1('dul ba): dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong dag seng ge'i pags pa'i lham gyon pa las gyur gyi/ de'i phyir dge slong gis seng ge'i pags pa'i lham bcang bar mi bya'o/ /snyam
397b2('dul ba): du dgongs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis seng ge'i pags pa'i lham bcang bar mi bya ste/ dge slong seng ge'i pags pa'i lham 'chang

397b5('dul ba): stobs can lnga po glang po cang shes dang / rta cang shes dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / gung gi pags pa'i lham bcang bar mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sen mo dang / mche ba'i stobs
397b6('dul ba): can lnga'i pags lham bcang bar mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ sen mo dang / mche ba'i stobs can gzhan
397b7('dul ba): dag kyang mchis na/ ci lags/ de dag gi pags pa'i lham yang bcang bar mi bgyi lags sam/ nye bar 'khor/ de dag gi pags pa'i lham yang bcang bar mi bya ste/ 'chang na/ 'gal
398a1('dul ba): tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /mnyan yod na dge slong zhig gzhang 'brum gyi nad kyis thebs pa de sman pa'i drung du song nas bzhin

398a6('dul ba): ma rnyed na/ steng rim gcig spun bag tu glan par bya'o/ /'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi las/ sgo lnga pa rdzogs so// //bsdus pa'i sdom ni/ rgyus pa rab snang drag po dang / /

398b1('dul ba): dang ni yu thung dang / /sgrog gu can dag mi bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan
398b2('dul ba): 'das kyis dge slong gis sen mo dang / mche ba'i stobs can lnga'i pags pa'i lham bcang bar mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis de dag gi rgyus pas lham btsems te nyes
398b3('dul ba): dmigs de nyid du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag gi rgyus pas lham btsem par mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi rgyus pas lham btsem par mi bya'o/ /zhes

398b6('dul ba): gi pags pa las brang lhan byas te nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag gi pags pa las brang lhan mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag
398b7('dul ba): gi pags pa las brang lhan mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis de dag gi pags pa las rting lhan byas te nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
399a1('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ de dag gi pags pa las rting lhan mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi pags pa las brang lhan dang / rting lhan mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa
399a2('dul ba): dang / drug sde rnams kyis de dag gi pags pa las lham yu chad byas te nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag gi pags pa las lham yu chad mi
399a3('dul ba): bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi pags pa las brang lhan dang / rting lhan dang / lham yu chad mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis de dag gi pags pa
399a4('dul ba): las lham yu thung byas te nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag gi pags pa las lham yu thung mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag
399a5('dul ba): gi pags pa las lham yu thung mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis de dag gi pags pa las lham sgrog gu can byas te nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/ bcom
399a6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag gi pags pa las lham sgrog gu can mi bya'o/ /sdom ni/ rab snang 'dod pa thams cad dang / /dge 'dun bshos dang bzo sbyangs dang / /mgon med
399a7('dul ba): zas sbyin khri'u rnams dang / /gtsug lag khang dang bzang po'o/ /bar sdom ni/ bltams dang rgyal po che dang bdag gi mthu/ /de bzhin mi dkar rab byung rgyal tshab dang / /sangs
399b1('dul ba): rgyas rgyal srid nyid dang yan lag mchog / de bzhin rmi lam sa 'dzin skyes dang gnas/ /byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa na/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na rgyal po
399b2('dul ba): pad+ma chen po zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste chos kyi rgyal po/ rgyal srid 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod
399b3('dul ba): pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / 'khrug long rab tu zhi ba/ chom rkun dang / nad med pa/ sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa/ chos dang mthun pas byed du 'jug go /mnyan
399b4('dul ba): yod na ni/ rgyal po tshangs byin ring du 'phur/ 'phags rgyal na ni/ mu khyud mtha' yas/ ko'u sham+b+hi na ni/ dmag brgya pa zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ rgyal srid rgyas pa dang
399b5('dul ba): zhes bya ba nas chos dang mthun par byed du 'jug go/ zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa na gzigs
399b6('dul ba): pa lnga po rigs la gzigs pa dang / dus la gzigs pa dang / yul la gzigs pa dang / rus la gzigs pa dang / bud med la gzigs pas 'jig rten la gzigs te 'dod pa na spyod pa
399b7('dul ba): lha drug kyang lan gsum du sbyang ba mdzad nas glang po cher bstan pas yum gyi lhums su zhugs so/ /de'i tshe sa chen po g.yos par gyur/ 'jig rten 'di thams cad kyang snang ba rgya chen
400a1('dul ba): pos sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi kha dog gi mthu yang zil gyis mnan nas khyab par gyur te/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun gnag
400a2('dul ba): thibs po smag tu gyur pa gang du nyi ma dang / zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba 'di dag gi 'od kyis kyang snang bar ma nus pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang de'i tshe snang ba
400a3('dul ba): rgya chen pos khyab par gyur te/ der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag rang gi lag nas bzung yang mi mthong ba de dag kyang 'od des sems can phan tshun mthong nas shes ldan dag/
400a4('dul ba): sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes pa lta/ shes ldan dag/ sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes pa lta zhes bya bar shes so/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das
400a5('dul ba): bltams pa de'i tshe/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i bu yang btsas te/ rgyal po'i khab tu ni/ rgyal po pad+ma chen po'i bu btsas so/ /mnyan yod du ni/ tshangs byin gyi/ 'phags rgyal du ni/ mu khyud
400a6('dul ba): mtha' yas kyi/ ko'u sham+b+hir ni rgyal po dmag brgya pa'i bu btsas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa na/ sa chen po 'di gser zhun ma lta bur snang bar gyur pa dang / rgyal po
400a7('dul ba): so so nas bsam pa/ bdag gi bu'i mthu'o/ /bdag gi bu'i mthu'o/ /snyam nas de dag so so nas ming 'dogs par byed de/ rgyal po pad+ma chen pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag /nga'i bu
400b1('dul ba): btsas pa na nyi ma'i gzugs bzhin du 'jig rten snang bar byas pas/ de'i phyir gzhon nu'i ming gzugs can snying po zhes gdags so/ /rgyal po tshangs byin ring du 'phur gyis smras pa/
400b2('dul ba): nga'i bu btsas pa na ljongs rnams gsal zhing gsal ba lta bur snang bas/ de'i phyir gzhon nu'i ming gsal rgyal zhes bya bar gdags so/ /rgyal po bu khyud mtha' yas kyis smras pa/ nga'i
400b3('dul ba): bu btsas pa na 'jig rten rab tu snang ba kho nas snang bar byas pas/ de'i phyir gzhon nu'i ming rab snang zhes bya bar gdags so/ /rgyal po dmag brgya bas smras pa/ nga'i bu btsas pa na 'jig
400b4('dul ba): rten nyi ma shar ba bzhin du snang bar byas pas/ de'i phyir gzhon nu'i ming shar par gdags so/ /de'i tshe ri ki skin da la drang srong mi dkar ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten de'i 'jig pa la mkhas
400b5('dul ba): pa/ 'chags pa la mkhas pa zhig gnas so/ /de'i tsha bo na la da zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de/ de'i drung du yang dang yang du nye bar 'gro'o/ /de nye bar 'ongs pa de la rtag tu 'jig pa dang / 'chags pa'i
400b6('dul ba): gtam byas te/ de 'jig pa dang 'chags pa'i gtam thos nas skyo ste de'i thad du rab tu byung ngo / /des dus gzhan zhig na drang srong mi dkar ba'i phug snang ba rgya chen pos khyab pa mthong ngo / /mthong
400b7('dul ba): nas kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ nyi ma thams cad gcig car du/ /'dir ni shar pa 'gyur tam ci/ 'di ltar ri dang phug bcas par/ /'od zer dag gis 'bar ba bzhin/ /mi dkar
401a1('dul ba): ba yis de smras pa/ /nyi ma'i 'od tsha 'od 'di bsil/ /lus 'dir snang ba 'jug pas na/ /'di ni nges par thub pa'i 'od/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od po che/ /gdon
401a2('dul ba): mi za bar lhums nas 'byung / /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' de/ /'byung ba'i 'od ni dri med pa/ /'jig rten gsum po dag tu ni/ /gser dang 'dra ba bkye ba yin/ /na la das smras pa/
401a3('dul ba): mkhan po/ gal te de lta na/ tshur spyon/ byang chub sems dpa' gzigs kyi/ bzhud do/ /des smras pa/ bu/ da lta byang chub sems dpa' lha dbang che bar grags pa/ dbang che bar grags
401a4('dul ba): pa rnams kyis bskor cing bzhugs te/ de bdag cag gis mthong bar sla ba ma yin gyi/ gang gi tshe pho brang du gshegs nas mtshan btags te phyir byung ba de'i tshe bltar 'dod do/ /gang
401a5('dul ba): gi nyin par byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa de nyid kyi nyin mo 'dun pa la sogs pa rim gro pa lnga brgya dang / 'dun ma la sogs pa rim gro ma lnga brgya dang / glang po che mo lnga brgya dang / rta
401a6('dul ba): rgod ma lnga brgya yang bcas shing 'brangs/ gter lnga brgya yang kha bye ste snang ngo / /blon po rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la sbran pa/ lha/ zhal rjes dgyes pa mdzad du gsol/ gzhon nu
401a7('dul ba): bltams pa na don 'di snyed grub ste/ rim gro pa lnga brgya dang / rim gro ma lnga brgya yang btsas/ glang po che mo lnga brgya dang / rta rgod ma lnga brgya yang btsas shing 'brangs/ gter lnga brgya yang
401b1('dul ba): kha bye ste bstan lags so/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos nas yid bde ba skyes te smras pa/ shes ldan dag /gzhon nu btsas pa na/ nga'i don thams cad dang / las kyi mtha' thams cad grub
401b2('dul ba): pas/ de'i phyir gzhon nu'i ming don thams cad grub pa zhes bya bar gdags so/ /zhes de na byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan 'di lta ste/ don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba der btags so/ /byang
401b3('dul ba): chub sems dpa' rin po che sna bzhi'i khyogs la bzhag ste sems can stong phrag du mas bskor nas lha dang mi'i bkur sti chen pos ser skya'i gzhi'i grong khyer du zhugs so/ /byang chub sems
401b4('dul ba): dpa' grong khyer du zhugs pa na/ shAkya nga rgyal can/ mu cor smra ba/ thugs thub can rnams thub pa bzhin du cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ shAkya nga rgyal
401b5('dul ba): can/ mu cor smra ba/ thugs thub can 'di dag gzhon nu grong khyer du zhugs pa dang / thub pa bzhin du cang mi smra ba 'dug pa de'i phyir gzhon nu'i ming shAkya thub par gdags so/ /zhes de na
401b6('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan gnyis pa 'di lta ste/ shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba der btags so/ /shAkya rnams la gnod sbyin gzhug mar gnas pa shAkya spel ba zhes bya ba zhig yod de/
401b7('dul ba): shAkya su'i bu'am/ bu mo btsas kyang rung / de dang por gnod sbyin shAkya spel ba'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du khrid pas rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag /deng la gzhon nu
402a1('dul ba): gnod sbyin shAkya spel ba'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du chug cig / blon po rnams kyis de'i mdun du khrid pa dang / gnod sbyin shAkya spel bas byang chub sems dpa' thag
402a2('dul ba): ring po kho na nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de brtad de rings par gom pa bslang nas byang chub sems dpa' bsus te rkang pa la phyag byas pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ shes
402a3('dul ba): ldan dag/ gnod sbyin shAkya spel ba yang / gzhon nu'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/ de lta bas na/ 'di ni/ lha'i yang lha yin pas/ de'i phyir gzhon nu'i ming lha'i yang lha zhes gdags
402a4('dul ba): so| |zhes de na byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan gsum pa 'di lta ste/ lha'i yang lha zhes bya bar btags so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis byang chub sems dpa' bram ze rnams dang /
402a5('dul ba): mtshan mkhan rnams dang / skar mkhan rnams la bstan nas shes ldan dag/ gzhon nu ci gang dag dang ldan na/ skyes bu chen po'i 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi/ gzhan du ma yin
402a6('dul ba): te/ gal te khyim pa khyim na gnas na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba/ chos kyi rgyal po/ chos dang mthun pa/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par
402a7('dul ba): 'gyur zhing / de'i rin po che sna bdun ni/ 'di lta bu dag yin te/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / btsun mo
402b1('dul ba): rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa blon po rin po che'o/ /gal te skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig dag bgos te dad pas yang dag par khyim nas khyim med
402b2('dul ba): par rab tu byung na/ 'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa
402b3('dul ba): gnyis dang ldan nam/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha/ de lta lags te/ gzhon nu ni/ gang dag dang ldan na/ skyes bu chen po'i 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi/ gzhan du ma lags te zhes bya ba
402b4('dul ba): nas 'jig rten na sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ba skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan lags so/ /na la das smras pa/ mkhan po/ byang chub sems dpa' ser skya'i
402b5('dul ba): grong khyer du gshegs te de'i mtshan yang btags lags kyi/ tshur gshegs/ gzigs su bzhud do/ /des smras pa/ bu/ legs te/ de bzhin bya'i/ 'dong ngo / /zhes de gnyis rdzu 'phrul
402b6('dul ba): gyis chas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthus de'i rdzu 'phrul nyams te rkang pa kho nas ser skya'i gzhi'i grong khyer du zhugs nas rgyal po zas gtsang gi pho brang ga la ba der song ste phyin nas
402b7('dul ba): rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo na sdod do/ /de nas drang srong mi dkar bas mi zhig la smras pa/ kye skyes bu/ khyod tshur shog /song la rgyal po zas gtsang la drang srong mi dkar ba lha la blta bar
403a1('dul ba): 'dad de sgo na 'dug go/ zhes sbron cig /des song nas rgyal po zas gtsang la/ lha/ drang srong mi dkar ba lha la blta bar 'tshal te chab sgo na mchis so/ /zhes
403a2('dul ba): sbran pa dang / des smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ drang srong mi dkar ba la su 'gog /nang du shog cig /de nang du zhugs pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis byon pa legs so/ /zhes bya ba'i
403a3('dul ba): kun tu spyod pas kun tu spyad nas rkang pa la mchod yon phul te seng ge'i khri la 'dug tu bcug go/ de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/ drang
403a4('dul ba): srong chen po/ ci zhig gi slad du byon/ des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ rgyal chen bdag ni khyod kyi sras/ /blta bar 'tshal nas mchis lags te/ /'jig rten gtso bo rnam 'dren pa/ /
403a5('dul ba): thub pa de ni blta 'tshal lo/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ drang srong chen po/ gzhon nu gnyid log go /des smras pa/ mnal bzhin blta bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal po zas gtsang
403a6('dul ba): gis smras pa/ drang srong chen po/ legs kyi/ de bzhin du mdzod/ gzigs shig /des song nas byang chub sems dpa' mig mi 'dzum par gzugs rnams la gzigs pa mthong ngo //
403a7('dul ba): mthong nas kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ rigs pa rta pho rnam dag ni/ /nam gyi gung la nyal ba ltar/ /dgos pa don du gnyer rnams kyi/ /mig la yun ring gnyid mi gnas/ /
403b1('dul ba): zhes smras nas smras pa/ lha/ ci/ gzhon nu bram ze rnams dang / mtshan mkhan rnams dang / skar mkhan rnams la bstan tam/ des smras pa/ drang srong chen po/ bstan to/ /lha/ de dag gis
403b2('dul ba): ci zhig tu lung bstan/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /zhes mchi'o/ /des byang chub sems dpa' la yan man brtag par brtsams pa/ ji tsam
403b3('dul ba): na byang chub sems dpa' la sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rnams mthong nas dus ji tsam gyis bdud rtsi thob par 'gyur zhes bsam pa la zhugs nas des lo nyi shu rtsa dgu lon pa dang / khyim nas byung
403b4('dul ba): ste lo drug tu dka' ba spyad nas bdud rtsi thob par 'gyur bar mthong ngo / /des bdag nyid kyi rgyud bsam pa la zhugs pa dang / bar skabs su 'chi bar mthong nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sred pa byung
403b5('dul ba): ba de/ mig mchi mas gang bzhin tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ sa bdag rtog ge rnams kyi blo gros 'khrul/ /dus kyi mthar ni 'khor los bsgyur mi 'byung / /bsod nams mchog can
403b6('dul ba): 'di ni chos kyi mdzod/ /nyes pa rnams las rgyal te sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /mi yi dbang po mtshan gsal min rnams kyis/ /gling bzhi rnams kyi bdag por dbang phyug 'gyur/ /shin tu
403b7('dul ba): mtshan gsal thub dbang rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /mi mchog chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur/ /de nas rgyal pos de mig mchi mas gang ba mthong nas bag tsha ste mi dga' nas slar tshigs
404a1('dul ba): su bcad de smras pa/ skyes pa bud med dag ni gang 'phrad nas/ /ngoms par mi 'gyur dga' ba thob 'gyur ba/ /lus bzang dga' byed de ni 'dir gzigs nas/ /ci
404a2('dul ba): slad khyod kyi zhal ni mchi mar bcas/ /bdag gi gzhon nu 'ga' las 'jigs pa'am/ /tshe zad nye bar gnas par ma gyur grang / /de slad dge ba 'di myur bdag la gsungs/ /khyod kyi bshums
404a3('dul ba): mo byung bas bdag 'dar to/ /des kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gal te 'di yi steng du mkha' las ni/ /rdo rje'i char drag rab tu bab gyur kyang / /thub pa chen po'i sku yi spu nyag gcig/
404a4('dul ba): kun tu bskyod par nus pa ma yin no/ /tshan chen rlung gis rab tu bskyod pa yi/ /shin tu mi bzad mtshon rnon rnams dag dang / /sprul gdug rnams dang shin tu gdug pa'i dug /gzhon
404a5('dul ba): nu'i lus la bab kyang rmas mi nus/ /mi dbang bdag ni chos mchog mdzod 'di dang / /'phrad nas don ma grub par 'chi 'gyur te/ /zhi ba mi 'thob rang gi nyes mthong nas/ /de yi slad du
404a6('dul ba): bdag ni ngu bar bas/ /'jig rten dag ni gang rnams dus su ni/ /smra ba'i dam pa mtshungs med 'di yi chos/ /nyan cing thos nas rab zhi mchog 'gro ba/ /bde skyid bsod nams can de
404a7('dul ba): rims nad bral/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis byang chub sems dpas bdud rtsi 'thob par thos nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go /log pa'i lta bas nyams pa ni/ phal cher rdzun smra ba
404b1('dul ba): dang / g.yo kun tu spyod pa la zhugs pa yan pas/ drang srong mi dkar bas smras pa/ lha/ khyod kyi grong khyer na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'di snyam du/ kye ma drang srong mi dkar ba rkang gis ser skya'i
404b2('dul ba): bzhi'i grong khyer du 'ongs kyang ci ma rung snyam du yun ring po nas smon pas/ bdag skye bo la snying brtse ba'i phyir rkang kho nas ser skya'i gzhi'i grong khyer du 'ongs te rkang kho nas 'byung gi /grong khyer
404b3('dul ba): mdzes par bgyid du stsol cig/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag/ drang srong mi dkar ba rkang gis grong khyer nas 'byung gi/ grong khyer dang lam mdzes
404b4('dul ba): par byed du chug la dril bsgrags te 'di skad du/ ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang / yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa gzhan gyis kyang drang srong mi dkar ba grong khyer nas
404b5('dul ba): 'byung ba bsus shig ces kyang sgos shig/ lha/ de ltar 'tshal lo/ /zhes blon po rnams kyis ser skya'i gzhi'i grong khyer rdo dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo med par byas/ tsan+dan gyi chus
404b6('dul ba): chag chag btab/ dri zhim po'i phog phor bzhag/ dar gyi lnga ldi mang po bres/ rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng / me tog sna tshogs bkram ste lha rnams kyi skyed mos tshal/ dga' ba'i tshal
404b7('dul ba): bas kyang lhag par dga' dga' ltar grong khyer mdzes pa dang / lam mdzes par byas nas dril bsgrags te 'di skad ces/ shes ldan dag /grong khyer na gnas pa rnams dang / pho brang
405a1('dul ba): 'khor ba rnams dang / yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs nyon cig/ lhas 'di skad ces/ drang srong mi dkar ba sang rkang gis ser skya'i gzhi'i
405a2('dul ba): grong khyer nas 'byung gi/ de'i phyir khyed thams cad kyis de bsus shig ces bka' stsal te/ ji tsam nam nangs pa dang drang srong mi dkar ba mi'i mchog stong phrag du mas bkur sti chen
405a3('dul ba): pos bskyal nas rkang gis ser skya'i gzhi'i grong khyer nas byung ngo / /des ri ki skin dar song nas yang bsam gtan dag kyang bskyed/ rdzu 'phrul yang bsgrubs so/ /de'i tshe rnam par smin
405a4('dul ba): pa'i las yongs su zad pas nad kyis thebs te rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / me tog dang / 'dab ma dang / 'bras bu'i sman rnams kyis rim gro byas kyang nad nye bar zhi bar ma gyur to/ /na la das
405a5('dul ba): de'i lus kyi gnas skabs shes nas rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/ mkhan po/ gang cung zad rab tu byung ba de thams cad ni/ bdud rtsi don du gnyer ba dang / bdud rtsi tshol ba lags
405a6('dul ba): te| de'i slad du gal te khyod kyis bdud rtsi rnyed na/ bdag la yang bdud rtsi'i bgo bsha' mdzad du gsol/ des smras pa/ bu/ nga yang gang cung zad rab tu byung ba de thams cad bdud rtsi don
405a7('dul ba): du gnyer ba dang / bdud rtsi tshol ba yin na/ ngas kyang bdud rtsi ma rnyed do/ /'on kyang khyod shAkya rnams kyi nang du gzhon nu 'khrungs pa de'i spyan sngar rab tu byung la rigs kyi rlom pa ma byed/ rus
405b1('dul ba): kyi rlom pa ma byed/ bram ze'i bu'i rlom pa ma byed par nga rgyal chog la tshangs pa spyad pa spyod cig dang / des na/ khyod bdud rtsi thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras nas/ bsags pa kun gyi mtha'
405b2('dul ba): 'dzad cing / /mthon po'i mtha' ni bsnyil bar 'gyur/ /'phrad pa'i mtha' ni 'bral ba ste/ gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin/ /zhes bya bas dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur to/ /des de'i rus bu
405b3('dul ba): la rus bu'i mchod pa byas nas grong khyer wA ra NA sir song ste drang srong gi nang na 'dug go / de na la da dang rus mthun pas de'i ming drang srong na la da zhes bya bar chags so/ /gzhon nu rab
405b4('dul ba): snang ma ma brgyad po/ pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtsen grogs kyi ma ma gnyis la gtad nas de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma
405b5('dul ba): dang / zho dang / mar gsar dang / mar dkar dang / mar gyi nying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par gtso bo gtso bo dag gis bskyed bsrings pas/ mtshe'u na 'dug pa'i pad+ma bzhin du skyed
405b6('dul ba): drag par gyur to/ /de gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe yi ge dang / grangs dang / rtsis dang / lag rtsis dang / rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ yul gyi dbang phyug la gnas
405b7('dul ba): pa'i mthu thob pa/ sa chen po'i dkyil 'khor rnal du phab ste gnas pa rnams kyi bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas tha dad pa gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i gnyar zhon pa dang / rta la
406a1('dul ba): zhon pa dang / shing rta'i thabs dang / ral gri'i thabs dang / 'phong dpyad dang / phyir snur ba dang / mdun du snur ba dang / lcags kyus sgyur thabs dang / zhags
406a2('dul ba): pas gdab pa dang / mda' bo che 'phen pa dang / gcad pa dang / dral ba dang / 'dzin stangs dang / gom stabs dang / thor tshugs dang / rgyang nas phog pa dang / sgra grag par phog pa dang /
406a3('dul ba): gnad du phog pa dang / mi 'chor bar phog pa dang / tshabs chen po de dag la mkhas par gyur te/ gnas lnga la yang byang bar gyur to/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan
406a4('dul ba): 'das gzhon nu'i rol pa la rol pa de'i tshe gzhon nu rab snang yang gzhon nu'i rtse ba la rtse'o/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba de'i tshe gzhon nu rab snang yang
406a5('dul ba): rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur to/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rgan po dang nad pa dang shi ba gzigs nas skyo ste sa 'tsho ma dang / ri dwags skyes dang / grags 'dzin ma la sogs pa bud
406a6('dul ba): m ed drug khri spangs nas nam gyi gung la dka' thub kyi nags su gnas te gong ma dang 'og ma'i rnam pa las grol ba'i drang srong rnams kyi thad nas 'dod pa'i khams las 'dod chags
406a7('dul ba): dang bral ba dang / gzugs kyi khams las 'dod chags dang bral ba nas rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod kyi thad nas gzugs med pa'i khams/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar las
406b1('dul ba): 'dod chags dang bral bar byas te lung 'bog pa med pa'i phyir dka' ba spyad pa rung ngo / /snyam nas lo drug tu dka' ba spyad na/ khyad par rtogs pa thob par ma gyur te/ dbugs kyang ci
406b2('dul ba): bder rngubs shing / ci bder phyung / zhal zas rags pa 'bras chan dang / zan dron yang gsol/ mar dkar dang til mar gyis kyang sku byugs/ chu grang dro ran pas kyang sku khrus mdzad nas
406b3('dul ba): sde grong zhes bya ba'i grong du gshegs nas bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs las 'o thug sbrang rtsi can lan bcu drug tu nying khur byas pa bzhes te gsol nas klu'i rgyal po nag pos bstod
406b4('dul ba): cing / rtswa tshong bkra shis las rtswa dag bzhes nas byang chub kyi shing drung ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas nyid kyis rtswa ma 'khrugs ma 'dzings par bting ste bzhugs nas skyil mo krung bcas te
406b5('dul ba): sku drang por bsrang / dgongs pa mngon du bzhag nas ji srid zag pa zad pa ma thob pa de srid kyi bar du skyil mo krung mi gzhig go /snyam du thugs bskyed cing tshig tu yang gsungs te/ des
406b6('dul ba): ji srid du zag pa zad pa ma brnyes pa de srid du skyil mo krung ma bshig go / gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud 'byung po dkrigs phrag drug cu'i 'khor can byams pa'i mtshon gyis
406b7('dul ba): p ham par mdzad nas bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes te tshangs pas bskul nas yul wA ra NA sir gshegs te lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo chos dang
407a1('dul ba): mthun pa bskor ba de'i tshe gzhon nu rab snang yang rgyal po chen por dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ro/ /de na yul 'phags rgyal na rgyal po rab snang zhes bya ba/
407a2('dul ba): chos kyi rgyal po/ rgyal srid 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo mang po dang mis gang ba/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / 'khrug long rab tu zhi
407a3('dul ba): ba| chom rkun dang / nad med pa/ sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa/ chos dang mthun pas byed du 'jug ste/ de'i mthus rtag tu dga' ston gyis rab tu dga'o/ /
407a4('dul ba): grong khyer 'phags rgyal de na dbang po lnga dang / nye dbang lnga yod do/ /rdzing bu lnga brgya las wa nas 'bab pa'i chu lnga brgya rgyal po'i pho brang grong khyer mdzes pa zhes bya ba de nyid du 'bab
407a5('dul ba): bo| |rgyal po rab snang yan lag mchog lnga po/ glang po che 'dam bu'i ri dang / glang po che mo bzang ldan dang / rnga mo rgya mtsho'i rkang dang / rta gos mgrin dang / 'phar ma pa khwa zhes bya ba
407a6('dul ba): yod de/ de dag las 'dam bu'i ris ni/ nyin zhag gcig la dpag tshad brgya chod do/ /bzang ldan gyis ni/ dpag tshad brgyad cu'o/ /rgya mtsho'i rkang gis ni/ dpag tshad bdun cu'o/ /

407b1('dul ba): thebs so/ /rgyal po de ni/ mar la sdang zhing chang la dga' ba zhig ste/ de la sman pa rnams kyis rdzas kyi tshogs rnams kyi khyad par sna tshogs dang sbyar ba'i mar blud na/ de 'thung du ma thub bo/ /de la
407b2('dul ba): btsun mo'i 'khor dang / gzhon nu dang / blon po dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams kyis mar blud par byas na/ mar la je khro bar rtsom zhing gang zhig mar gyi ming byin pa de'i mgo drungs nas bcad
407b3('dul ba): nas sa la 'dor bar byed do/ /de gnyid med pas nam gyi thun dang po la ni/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig dga' ba'i rtsed mo nyams su myong bar byed do/ /gnyis pa la ni/ glang po che dang / rta
407b4('dul ba): dag la lta'o/ /gsum pa la ni/ 'bangs mel tshe ba rnams la de ltar mel tshe su byed mel tshe su byed ces 'dri zhing / de gang zhig tshig dang po la ni/ lan mi glon pa de la yang bzod do/ /
407b5('dul ba): gnyis pa la lan mi glon pa de la yang bzod do/ /gang zhig gsum pa la lan mi lon pa de'i ni/ mgo drungs nas bcad nas sa la 'dor bar byed pas/ de'i ming rgyal po rab snang / rgyal po rab
407b6('dul ba): snang zhes bya ba gang yin pa de nub nas ming gtum po rab snang / gtum po rab snang zhes bya bar chags so/ /des dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo'i 'khor rnams la smras pa/ bud med dag /

408a1('dul ba): bdag cag gis rtag tu zhugs tshe bgyi na/ lha'i thugs srung bar bgyi ba'i rngo mi thogs kyi steng du 'di ni/ bdag cag gi sug las ma lags so/ /des smras pa/ gal

408a3('dul ba): nu dag / nga yang mel tshe byed na/ khyed ci'i phyir mel tshe mi byed/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha/ bdag cag kyang zhugs tshe bgyid do/ /de dag gis kyang mel tshe cung zad cig byas nas smras pa/ lha/
408a4('dul ba): gal te bdag cag gis rtag tu zhugs tshe bgyis na/ rgyal po'i bya ba gang dag lags pa zhes bya ba nas gnas lnga la zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin te/ byang bar bgyi ba'i rngo mi thogs kyi steng du
408a5('dul ba): 'di ni/ bdag cag gi sug las ma lags so/ /des smras pa/ gal te 'di khyed kyi las ma yin na/ 'o na 'di su'i las yin/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha/ blon po rnams kyi lags so/ /

408b1('dul ba): cag gi sug las ma lags so/ /des smras pa/ gal te 'di khyed kyi las ma yin na/ 'o na 'di su'i las yin/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha/ khrom gyi ru'i lags so/ /des de dag btang nas khrom gyi

408b7('dul ba): po de dag gtum pas gsad du dogs te/ yid mi dga' zhing lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa dang / de sems khong du chud pa grogs po zhig gis mthong nas smras

413a3('dul ba): pos de bzhin du mel tshe su byed ces smras pa dang / des snga ma'i tshul du smras pa dang / lha/ sa 'dzin pa bdag go /rgyal pos smras pa/ sa 'dzin pa/ ci sems/ lha/ 'jig rten pa'i bsam
413a4('dul ba): pa'o/ /sa 'dzin pa/ 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa ji lta bu zhig /lha/ dong brkos pa las de de nyid du stsal na/ mnyam par mi 'gyur lags so/ /sa 'dzin pa/ ci/ de de ltar 'gyur ram/
413a5('dul ba): lha| spyan sngar dbab par bgyi'o/ /sa 'dzin pa/ legs so/ /des phyi de nyin mngon sum du byas na/ thams cad de bzhin du gyur pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ sa 'dzin pa/ 'di la rgyu
413a6('dul ba): ci yod/ lha/ mi ma lags pas mdangs 'phrog pa'i slad du'o/ /sa 'dzin pa/ khyod ni/ mkhas pa zhig go /lha/ khyod kyi bka' drin lags so/ /zhes byas pa dang / rgyal po cang mi zer
413a7('dul ba): bar 'dug go / yang rgyal pos de bzhin du mel tshe su byed ces smras pa dang / des snga ma'i tshul du smras pa/ lha/ sa 'dzin pa bdag go /rgyal pos smras pa/ sa 'dzin pa/ ci sems/
413b1('dul ba): lha| 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa'o/ /sa 'dzin pa/ 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa ji lta bu zhig /lha/ tha ga pas nyin mtshan du gos btags na/ gar mchis pa ma 'tshal lo/ /kye sa 'dzin pa/ gar
413b2('dul ba): song mi shes pa yus so/ /lha/ sar gyur pa lags so/ /kye sa 'dzin pa/ sar gyur pa lta zhig /yang rgyal pos de bzhin du mel tshe su byed ces smras pa dang / des snga ma'i tshul du smras pa/ lha/ sa
413b3('dul ba): 'dzin pa bdag go / sa 'dzin pa/ ci sems/ lha/ 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa'o/ /sa 'dzin pa/ 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa ji lta bu zhig /lha/ rdza mkhan gyis nyin mtshan du snod bgyis na/ de gar
413b4('dul ba): mchis ma 'tshal to/ /kye sa 'dzin pa/ gar song mi shes pa yus so/ /lha/ sar gyur to/ /kye sa 'dzin pa/ sar gyur pa lta zhig /kye sa 'dzin pa/ khyod ni/ mkhas pa zhig ste/ thams cad
413b5('dul ba): shes na/ nga gnyid med pa 'di la rgyu ci yod/ lha/ mi 'jigs pa stsal na/ smra bar bgyi'o/ /sa 'dzin pa/ mi 'jigs pa sbyin gyi/ bag ma tsha bar smros shig /lha/ khyod ni/ sdig pa las
413b6('dul ba): skyes so/ /sa 'dzin pa/ ci/ khyod nga la mi snyan pa zer ram/ lha/ de skad ma gsungs shig /lha la bdag gis mi snyan pa ji skad du bgyis/ lha/ mi snyan pa ma bgyis te/ lha'i mngon sum
413b7('dul ba): du bgyi'o/ /sa 'dzin pa/ legs so/ /des dong brkos nas ba lang gi lci bskam pos bkang ste/ de'i steng du mal bcas te phyi de nyin rgyal po la/ lha/ mal 'dir gzims shig /ces
414a1('dul ba): smras pa dang / rgyal pos der nyal lo/ /nyal ma thag tu gnyid kyis log par gyur to/ /gang gi tshe sad pa de'i tshe/ lha/ khyod kyis gzigs sam zhes smras pa dang /
414a2('dul ba): des bdag gis mngon sum du byas pa shes nas btsun mo'i 'khor du song ste ma la dris pa/ yum/ bdag su las skyes pa rdzun ma gsung bar drang por gsungs shig /lha/ smra bar bgyi
414a3('dul ba): yi| bdag la mi 'jigs pa stsol cig / yum/ gsol lo/ /lha/ khyod kyi yab btsun mo'i 'khor rgya chen po dang ldan pas de ljongs shig tu song ba na/ bdag zla mtshan dang ldan par gyur
414a4('dul ba): te| de'i tshe bdag zla mtshan gyi khrus bgyid pa na/ sdig pa zhig mthong ba dang / bdag gi blo skyes pa/ ci ste 'di pho zhig tu gyur na/ bdag 'di dang lhan cig 'dod pa'i longs spyod dga' mgur
414a5('dul ba): spyad par bya'o/ /snyam pa dang / des de pho zhig tu gyur nas de dang bdag lhan cig tu 'dod pa'i longs spyod dga' mgur spyad pa dang / de las khyod skyes par gyur to/ /des bsam pa/ sa 'dzin
414a6('dul ba): pa de ni/ mkhas pa zhig ste/ des bdag shes na/ de la bdag gis mi 'jigs pa byin pas/ de gsad du ni mi rung gi/ gzhan su la yang mi zer bar bya ba'i phyir bya dga' byin la yul
414a7('dul ba): dbyung ngo / /snyam nas des de la kaR+sha pa Na lnga brgya byin te yul phyung ngo / /sdom ni/ 'tsho byed dang ni gser 'od dang / e la'i 'dab dang na la da/ /rab byung skra can zas dang ni/ /'bru mar
414b1('dul ba): snod ni tha ma'o/ /rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis bsam pa/ bdag gi nad 'di gzhi cher gyur pas sman pa dag bsdus la dpyad bya'o/ /snyam du bsam nas/ des yul na gnas pa'i sman pa thams
414b2('dul ba): cad bsdus te smras pa/ shes ldan dag /nga'i nad 'di lta bu la dpyad gyis shig /de dag gis smras pa/ lha/ bdag cag gis khyod kyi dpyad bgyid pa'i rngo mi thogs te/ 'on kyang rgyal po'i khab na
414b3('dul ba): rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i bu sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed ces bgyi ba mchis te/ gal te na/ des lha'i dpyad bgyid pa rngo thogs so/ /des rgyal po gzugs can snying po la yi ge spring ste
414b4('dul ba): sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed tshur thong zhig / yang na nga 'o nir 'ong gi /rtswa dang / chab sta gon gyis shig /ces byas pa dang / rgyal po gzugs can snying pos yi ge bklags nas sdangs te lag pa
414b5('dul ba): 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug ste/ gal te 'tsho byed btang na/ de la ci dang ci dgos pa de 'gums pas don gyis bdag kyang de'i dpyas par gyur pas ma legs so/ /snyam
414b6('dul ba): nas de yid mi bde ba sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis mthong ngo / /de nas rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/ lha/ ci'i slad du phyag 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khong du chud cing bzhugs/
414b7('dul ba): des smras pa/ bu/ khyod kyis 'di lta bu'i bzo bslab pa des na/ gnod par gyur to/ /'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ ji ltar gnod par gyur/ des ji ltar gyur pa brjod pa dang / lha/ bka' lung stsal
415a1('dul ba): du gsol/ mchi bar bgyi'o/ /bu/ rgyal po de gtum po zhig ste/ ci'i phyir yang sems can gsod par byed pas khyod mi gsad grang / lha/ bdag srung mi nus
415a2('dul ba): pa'i sman pa de ci 'dra ba zhig ste/ thugs mi chung bar bdag gtang du gsol/ des smras pa/ bu/ gal te de lta na/ song la ji ltar nga dang btsun mo'i 'khor dang / gzhon nu dang / blon po dang /
415a3('dul ba): pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang / yul sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams mya ngan skye bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar khyod kyis bag yod par gyis shig /des/ lha/ ci'i slad du de ltar

415a5('dul ba): pa ni/ ci 'dra ba zhig /nad ni/ ji lta bu zhig gis thebs/ des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par bsnyad do/ /de nas 'tsho byed kyis chang gi kha dog dang / chang gi dri dang / chang gi ro bro ba'i mar sbyar
415a6('dul ba): nas dge mtshan dang / bkra shis dang / bde legs dag byas te grogs po dang / gnyen dang / phu nu bo rnams la sbran nas yul 'phags rgyal du song ngo / /de mthar gyis yul kan+ya kub dzar
415a7('dul ba): phyin pa dang / de na gnas pa'i sman pa'i khye'u zhig yod pa des/ ji ltar sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed 'ongs te 'phags rgyal du 'gro ba thos so/ /des a ru ra gcig khyer te de'i drung du
415b1('dul ba): song ste phan tshun yang dag par dga' ba dag byas nas 'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ kye chos kyi spun/ rgyal po gtum po rab snang de/ nad ji lta bu zhig gis thebs/ khyed cag gis de'i dpyad ma byas
415b2('dul ba): sam/ des smras pa/ rgyal po de gnyid med pa'i nad kyis thebs te/ de la mar phan na/ de mar la ni/ sdang / chang la ni/ dga' zhing gtum ste/ gang zhig de mdun du mar gyi ming 'byin pa de'i
415b3('dul ba): mgo drungs nas bcad de sa la 'dor bas/ de dag 'jigs nas 'bros na/ su zhig de'i dpyad byed par nus/ 'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ de'i phyir ngas chang gi kha dog dang / chang gi dri dang / chang gi ro
415b4('dul ba): bro ba'i mar bskol te khyer te 'ongs kyi/ 'dong / gang gi tshe ngas khyod la brda byas pa de'i tshe khyod kyis mar 'di tsam gyi tshod cig byin cig /nga ni/ de'i mdun nas 'gro yi/ khyod kyis re zhig tsam

415b6('dul ba): byed rim gyis 'phags rgyal dang nye bar phyin pa dang / rgyal po rab snang gis ji ltar sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed 'ongs pa thos nas des bsam pa/ de ni/ rgyal po'i bu yang yin la/ sman pa'i

416a1('dul ba): po dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang bcas pas bsus nas sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed mi stong phrag du mas bskor te grong khyer du 'ongs so/ /de nas de lam gyis
416a2('dul ba): dub pa ngal bsos te cung zhig bsdad nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis 'tsho byed la/ bdag gnyid med pa'i nad dkyel cher gyur na/ dpyad gyis shig ces smras pa dang / des smras pa/

416a4('dul ba): mchis/ kha cig gzhan gyis 'tshal la/ bdag gis ma 'tshal ba yang mchis/ kha cig bdag gis kyang 'tshal la/ gzhan gyis kyang 'tshal ba yang mchis/ kha cig thag ring po na yang
416a5('dul ba): mchis/ kha cig nye ba na yang mchis pas/ khyod kyis glang po che mo bzang ldan bdag la ci bder mdzod cig /rgyal pos 'tsho byed/ legs kyi/ de bzhin du gyis shig /ces smras nas des
416a6('dul ba): glang po che 'dul ba rnams la bsgo ba/ 'tsho byed glang po che mo bzang ldan ci bder spyod du bcug gi /khyed cag gis ma dgag cig /blon po dang / chab sgo ba rnams la yang bsgo ba/
416a7('dul ba): 'di nyin par yang rung / mtshan mo yang rung / glang po che mo bzang ldan la zhon te 'gro zhing 'ong ba dang / khyed cag gis ma dgag par ji ltar 'dod par dga' mgur 'gro zhing 'ong du

416b2('dul ba): mig slob par rtsom pa na snga dro song zhing res 'ga' phyi dro slar 'ong ngo / /gung la song zhing res dga' phyi dro 'ong ngo / /phyi dro song zhing res 'ga' nub mo'i thun 'da' zhing 'ong ste/ de de ltar yid ches pa

417a1('dul ba): drungs nas bcad de dor ro/ /des kun tu btsal bar brtsams na/ mi snang nas des de la smras pa/ lha/ mi gda' ste/ de gdon mi 'tshal bar bros so/ /rgyal po de khros

417a6('dul ba): ces bsgo'o/ /'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ kwa'i khwa/ gal te de lta na/ khyod kyis phyed zo/ /ngas kyang phyed bza'o/ /des bsam pa/ phyed bza' ste/ phyed la sgyu ji lta bu zhig byar yod snyam du rig

417b1('dul ba): yan man gnyi gar 'khrus so/ /des de ri bor zhig tu bzhag nas ri bor pa de dag la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag/ rgyal po gtum por bya snang gi yan lag gi mchog gsum ni/ glang po 'dam bu'i
417b2('dul ba): ri dang / glang po che mo bzang ldan dang / 'phar ma pa khwa 'di yin na/ 'di lta ste dpyad 'dis rim gro gyis dang / sos par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan du na rgyal pos khyed cag nges par phung bar byed

418a2('dul ba): so| |rgyal pos khye'u de la rngan pa mang du byin no/ /'tsho byed la yang brgya stong ri ba'i ras yug chen gyi gos bskur ba dang / 'tsho byed kyis bsam pa/ gos 'di ni/ rgyal po la 'os pa yin

418a7('dul ba): chags na rdul dang ldan pa yin/ /rdul med na ni rdul bral 'gyur/ /gang gis 'dir ni chags zhes brjod/ /blo ngan ji ltar mya ngan byed/ /mkhas pa ji ltar dga' bar 'gyur/ /gang
418b1('dul ba): gis ldan pa las bral nas/ /'di na grub dang bde zhes brjod/ /ces bris te 'dug pa/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du ma byung ba de'i tshe sus kyang gzung bar yang mi nus/
418b2('dul ba): de dag gi don smra bar yang mi nus so/ /gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ba de'i tshe/ yang dri ba de dag gzung bar nus kyi/ de dag gi don smra bar ni/ mi nus so/ /re zhig
418b3('dul ba): cig na gnod sbyin gyi bdag po rnam thos kyi bu bya ba zhig gi phyir dga' ldan gyi lha'i nang du song ba na des dri ba bris pa de dag mthong ngo / /de nas ya mtshan skyes te de bzung na/ don khong du chud par
418b4('dul ba): ma nus te/ des de dag pho brang lcang lo can du khyer nas spang leb la bris te bzhag go/ de'i tshe rdo 'jog ces bya ba na klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab ces bya ba gnas pa de yun ring po nas bdag gis
